If Not (IsNull(strRegPath) Or strRegPath = "" ) Then objReg.GetDWORDValue HKLM,strRegPath,"OASState",intOnAccessScanEnabled Select Case intOnAccessScanEnabled Case 2 strReport = "Disabled" Case 3 strReport = "Enabled" End Select Else WScript.Echo "Error: Cannot determine On-Access Scan Status" End If
GetOASStatus = strReport
End Function 'GetOASStatus
Function GetMcAfeeProductRegRootKey(strProductString) ' Retrieves McAfee key for a product ' products are passed in and defined in the function
Dim strRootSoftwareKeyNative,strRootSoftwareKeyWow64,strProductSubKey Dim strProductKeyPath
' select on input strProductString = UCase(strProductString) Select Case strProductString Case "AGENT" strProductSubKey = "McAfee\Agent" Case "AVENGINE" strProductSubKey = "McAfee\AVEngine" Case "DESKTOPPROTECTION" strProductSubKey = "McAfee\DesktopProtection" Case "EPO" strProductSubKey = "McAfee\ePolicy Orchestrator" Case "HIPS" strProductSubKey = "McAfee\HIP" Case "HIPSCORE" strProductSubKey = "McAfee\HIPSCore" Case "MCTRAY" strProductSubKey = "McAfee\McTray" Case "SITEADVISOR" strProductSubKey = "McAfee\SiteAdvisor Enterprise Plus" Case "SYSTEMCORE" strProductSubKey = "McAfee\SystemCore" Case "VSCORE" strProductSubKey = "McAfee\VSCore" Case "NAIEPO" strProductSubKey = "Network Associates\ePolicy Orchestrator" Case "NAITVD" strProductSubKey = "Network Associates\TVD" Case Else strProductSubKey = False End Select
Const HKLM = &h80000002
strRootSoftwareKeyNative = "Software" strRootSoftwareKeyWow64 = "Software\Wow6432Node" If Not strProductSubKey = False Then ' Assume not in both places on a 64-bit machine If RegKeyExists(HKLM, strRootSoftwareKeyWow64&"\"&strProductSubKey) Then strProductKeyPath = strRootSoftwareKeyWow64&"\"&strProductSubKey ElseIf RegKeyExists(HKLM, strRootSoftwareKeyNative&"\"&strProductSubKey) Then strProductKeyPath = strRootSoftwareKeyNative&"\"&strProductSubKey End If Else strProductKeyPath = False End If
GetMcAfeeProductRegRootKey = strProductKeyPath
End Function 'GetMcAfeeProductRegRootKey
Function RegKeyExists(sHive, sRegKey) Dim aValueNames, aValueTypes If objReg.EnumValues(sHive, sRegKey, aValueNames, aValueTypes) = 0 Then RegKeyExists = True Else RegKeyExists = False End If End Function 'RegKeyExists
Function ServiceState(strServiceName) ' This function determines if a service is in a bad state and returns ' values indicating the state. Examples: ' "Stopped" ' "Stopped Manual" ' "Running Disabled" ' "Not Installed"
Dim objWMIService,strWMIQuery,colItems,objItem,strStartMode,strState
strWMIQuery = "Select * from Win32_Service Where Name = '" & strServiceName & "'"
strState = "" strStartMode = "" Set objWMIService = GetObject("winmgmts:" _ & "{impersonationLevel=impersonate}!\\.\root\cimv2") Set colItems = objWMIService.ExecQuery(strWMIQuery)
If colItems.Count = 0 Then ServiceState = "Not Installed" Else For Each objItem In colItems If objItem.State = "Stopped" Or objItem.State = "Paused" Then strState = objItem.State End If If objItem.StartMode = "Manual" Or objItem.StartMode = "Disabled" Then strStartMode = objItem.StartMode End If ServiceState = Trim(strState&" "&strStartMode) Next End If
End Function 'ServiceState
Function Getx64RegistryProvider ' Returns the best available registry provider: 32 bit on 32 bit systems, 64 bit on 64 bit systems Dim objWMIService, colItems, objItem, iArchType, objCtx, objLocator, objServices, objRegProv Set objWMIService = GetObject("winmgmts:\\.\root\CIMV2") Set colItems = objWMIService.ExecQuery("Select SystemType from Win32_ComputerSystem") For Each objItem In colItems If InStr(LCase(objItem.SystemType), "x64") > 0 Then iArchType = 64 Else iArchType = 32 End If Next
Set objCtx = CreateObject("WbemScripting.SWbemNamedValueSet") objCtx.Add "__ProviderArchitecture", iArchType Set objLocator = CreateObject("Wbemscripting.SWbemLocator") Set objServices = objLocator.ConnectServer("","root\default","","",,,,objCtx) Set objRegProv = objServices.Get("StdRegProv")
Set Getx64RegistryProvider = objRegProv End Function ' Getx64RegistryProvider

sensor.name: VirusScan Enterprise Version
sensor.description: Returns the version number of the McAfee AntiVirus client running on the machine. Example: 8.8.0.975

sensor.name: VirusScan Enterprise DAT Version
sensor.description: Returns the version of the McAfee VirusScan Enterprise DAT file currently loaded. Example: 6910

query.script:
'======================================== 'McAfee VirusScan Enterprise DAT Version '========================================
' Returns the DAT number for VSE
Option Explicit

If IsNumeric(intDatVersion)Then If IsNumeric(intDatVersionMinor) Then If CInt(intDatVersionMinor) = 0 Then GetDatVersion = intDatVersion Else GetDatVersion = intDatVersion&"."&intDatVersionMinor End If Else GetDatVersion = intDatVersion End If Else WScript.Echo "Error: Cannot determine VirusScan Enterprise DAT Version" End If Else WScript.Echo "Error: Cannot determine VirusScan Enterprise DAT Version" End If End Function 'GetDatVersion

sensor.name: VirusScan Enterprise DAT Days Old
sensor.description: Returns the age, in days, of the currently loaded DAT file for McAfee VirusScan Enterprise. Example: 1

query.script:
'======================================== ' McAfee VirusScan Enterprise Dat Days Old '========================================
' Returns, in days, the age of the currently applied DAT file
Option Explicit
Dim strServiceState ' First get the state of the service strServiceState = ServiceState("McShield") If strServiceState = "Not Installed" Then 'No further tests are necessary WScript.Echo "VirusScan Enterprise Not Installed" WScript.Quit End If
Const HKLM = &h80000002 Dim objReg Set objReg = Getx64RegistryProvider()
WScript.Echo GetDatAgeInDays
Function GetDatAgeInDays
Dim strDatDate,dtmDatDate,arrDatDateBits Dim strRegPath, intDaysOld
strRegPath = GetMcAfeeProductRegRootKey("AVEngine") If Not (IsNull(strRegPath) Or strRegPath = "" ) Then objReg.GetStringValue HKLM,strRegPath,"AVDatDate",strDatDate
'Date is in YYYY/MM/DD format, move to US/English If InStr(strDatDate,"/") > 0 Then 'valid value arrDatDateBits = Split(strDatDate,"/") strDatDate = arrDatDateBits(1)&"/"&arrDatDateBits(2)&"/"&arrDatDateBits(0) If IsDate(strDatDate) Then intDaysOld = CInt(GetDaysOld(strDatDate)) GetDatAgeInDays = intDaysOld Else WScript.Echo "Error: Cannot determine VirusScan Enterprise DAT age" End If Else ' Dat Date has no "/" in it and cannot be parsed or compared WScript.Echo "Error: Cannot determine VirusScan Enterprise DAT age" End If Else WScript.Echo "Error: Cannot determine VirusScan Enterprise DAT age" End If End Function 'GetDatAgeInDays
Function GetMcAfeeProductRegRootKey(strProductString) ' Retrieves McAfee key for a product ' products are passed in and defined in the function

' select on input strProductString = UCase(strProductString) Select Case strProductString Case "AGENT" strProductSubKey = "McAfee\Agent" Case "AVENGINE" strProductSubKey = "McAfee\AVEngine" Case "DESKTOPPROTECTION" strProductSubKey = "McAfee\DesktopProtection" Case "EPO" strProductSubKey = "McAfee\ePolicy Orchestrator" Case "HIPS" strProductSubKey = "McAfee\HIP" Case "HIPSCORE" strProductSubKey = "McAfee\HIPSCore" Case "MCTRAY" strProductSubKey = "McAfee\McTray" Case "SITEADVISOR" strProductSubKey = "McAfee\SiteAdvisor Enterprise Plus" Case "SYSTEMCORE" strProductSubKey = "McAfee\SystemCore" Case "VSCORE" strProductSubKey = "McAfee\VSCore" Case "NAIEPO" strProductSubKey = "Network Associates\ePolicy Orchestrator" Case "NAITVD" strProductSubKey = "Network Associates\TVD" Case Else strProductSubKey = False End Select
Const HKLM = &h80000002
strRootSoftwareKeyNative = "Software" strRootSoftwareKeyWow64 = "Software\Wow6432Node" If Not strProductSubKey = False Then ' Assume not in both places on a 64-bit machine If RegKeyExists(HKLM, strRootSoftwareKeyWow64&"\"&strProductSubKey) Then strProductKeyPath = strRootSoftwareKeyWow64&"\"&strProductSubKey ElseIf RegKeyExists(HKLM, strRootSoftwareKeyNative&"\"&strProductSubKey) Then strProductKeyPath = strRootSoftwareKeyNative&"\"&strProductSubKey End If Else strProductKeyPath = False End If
GetMcAfeeProductRegRootKey = strProductKeyPath
End Function 'GetMcAfeeProductRegRootKey
Function ServiceState(strServiceName) ' This function determines if a service is in a bad state and returns ' values indicating the state. Examples: ' "Stopped" ' "Stopped Manual" ' "Running Disabled" ' "Not Installed"
Dim objWMIService,strWMIQuery,colItems,objItem,strStartMode,strState
strWMIQuery = "Select * from Win32_Service Where Name = '" & strServiceName & "'"
strState = "" strStartMode = "" Set objWMIService = GetObject("winmgmts:" _ & "{impersonationLevel=impersonate}!\\.\root\cimv2") Set colItems = objWMIService.ExecQuery(strWMIQuery)
If colItems.Count = 0 Then ServiceState = "Not Installed" Else For Each objItem In colItems If objItem.State = "Stopped" Or objItem.State = "Paused" Then strState = objItem.State End If If objItem.StartMode = "Manual" Or objItem.StartMode = "Disabled" Then strStartMode = objItem.StartMode End If ServiceState = Trim(strState&" "&strStartMode) Next End If

Function RegKeyExists(sHive, sRegKey) Dim aValueNames, aValueTypes If objReg.EnumValues(sHive, sRegKey, aValueNames, aValueTypes) = 0 Then RegKeyExists = True Else RegKeyExists = False End If End Function 'RegKeyExists
Function GetDaysOld(strDate) 'date format is MM/DD/YYYY SetLocale(1033) Dim patternDate, today patternDate = CDate( strDate ) today = CDate( now ) GetDaysOld = DateDiff("d", patternDate, today) End Function 'GetDaysOld
Function Getx64RegistryProvider ' Returns the best available registry provider: 32 bit on 32 bit systems, 64 bit on 64 bit systems Dim objWMIService, colItems, objItem, iArchType, objCtx, objLocator, objServices, objRegProv Set objWMIService = GetObject("winmgmts:\\.\root\CIMV2") Set colItems = objWMIService.ExecQuery("Select SystemType from Win32_ComputerSystem") For Each objItem In colItems If InStr(LCase(objItem.SystemType), "x64") > 0 Then iArchType = 64 Else iArchType = 32 End If Next

Set Getx64RegistryProvider = objRegProv End Function ' Getx64RegistryProvider

sensor.name: VirusScan Enterprise Engine Version
sensor.description: Returns the 64-bit and 32-bit engine versions for VirusScan Enterprise Example: 5400.1158 (32-bit) 5400.1158 (64-bit)

query.script:
'======================================== 'McAfee VirusScan Enterprise Engine Version '========================================
' Returns the version number of the McAfee Scan Engine
Option Explicit
Const HKLM = &h80000002 Dim objReg Set objReg = Getx64RegistryProvider()
Dim strServiceState ' First get the state of the service strServiceState = ServiceState("McShield") If strServiceState = "Not Installed" Then 'No further tests are necessary WScript.Echo "VirusScan Enterprise Not Installed" WScript.Quit End If
Dim bHadOutput,strEngineVersion32,strEngineVersion64,bHas32 strEngineVersion32 = GetEngineVersion32 strEngineVersion64 = GetEngineVersion64
If Not (IsNull(strEngineVersion32) Or strEngineVersion32 = "") Then WScript.Echo strEngineVersion32 & " (32-bit)" bHas32 = True End If If Not (IsNull(strEngineVersion64) Or strEngineVersion64 = "") Then WScript.Echo strEngineVersion64 & " (64-bit)" End If
If Not bHadOutput And Not bHas32 Then ' other engine variables were not present, use non-bitness-specific WScript.Echo GetEngineVersion & " (32-bit)" End If
Function GetEngineVersion32
Dim intEngineVersion,intEngineVersionMinor Dim strRegPath
strRegPath = GetMcAfeeProductRegRootKey("AVEngine") If Not (IsNull(strRegPath) Or strRegPath = "" ) Then objReg.GetDWORDValue HKLM,strRegPath,"EngineVersion32Major",intEngineVersion objReg.GetDWORDValue HKLM,strRegPath,"EngineVersion32Minor",intEngineVersionMinor
If IsNumeric(intEngineVersion) And IsNumeric(intEngineVersionMinor) Then bHadOutput = True If CInt(intEngineVersionMinor) = 0 Then GetEngineVersion32 = intEngineVersion Else GetEngineVersion32 = intEngineVersion&"."&intEngineVersionMinor End If Else bHadOutput = False End If Else bHadOutput = False End If End Function 'GetEngineVersion32
Function GetEngineVersion64
Dim intEngineVersion,intEngineVersionMinor Dim strRegPath
strRegPath = GetMcAfeeProductRegRootKey("AVEngine") If Not (IsNull(strRegPath) Or strRegPath = "" ) Then objReg.GetDWORDValue HKLM,strRegPath,"EngineVersion64Major",intEngineVersion objReg.GetDWORDValue HKLM,strRegPath,"EngineVersion64Minor",intEngineVersionMinor
If IsNumeric(intEngineVersion) And IsNumeric(intEngineVersionMinor) Then bHadOutput = True If CInt(intEngineVersionMinor) = 0 Then GetEngineVersion64 = intEngineVersion Else GetEngineVersion64 = intEngineVersion&"."&intEngineVersionMinor End If Else bHadOutput = False End If Else bHadOutput = False End If End Function 'GetEngineVersion64
Function GetEngineVersion
Dim intEngineVersion,intEngineVersionMinor Dim strRegPath
strRegPath = GetMcAfeeProductRegRootKey("AVEngine") If Not (IsNull(strRegPath) Or strRegPath = "" ) Then objReg.GetDWORDValue HKLM,strRegPath,"EngineVersionMajor",intEngineVersion objReg.GetDWORDValue HKLM,strRegPath,"EngineVersionMinor",intEngineVersionMinor
If IsNumeric(intEngineVersion) And IsNumeric(intEngineVersionMinor) Then If CInt(intEngineVersionMinor) = 0 Then GetEngineVersion = intEngineVersion Else GetEngineVersion = intEngineVersion&"."&intEngineVersionMinor End If Else WScript.Echo "Error: Cannot determine VirusScan Enterprise Engine Version" End If Else WScript.Echo "Error: Cannot determine VirusScan Enterprise Engine Version" End If End Function 'GetEngineVersion

' select on input strProductString = UCase(strProductString) Select Case strProductString Case "AGENT" strProductSubKey = "McAfee\Agent" Case "AVENGINE" strProductSubKey = "McAfee\AVEngine" Case "DESKTOPPROTECTION" strProductSubKey = "McAfee\DesktopProtection" Case "EPO" strProductSubKey = "McAfee\ePolicy Orchestrator" Case "HIPS" strProductSubKey = "McAfee\HIP" Case "HIPSCORE" strProductSubKey = "McAfee\HIPSCore" Case "MCTRAY" strProductSubKey = "McAfee\McTray" Case "SITEADVISOR" strProductSubKey = "McAfee\SiteAdvisor Enterprise Plus" Case "SYSTEMCORE" strProductSubKey = "McAfee\SystemCore" Case "VSCORE" strProductSubKey = "McAfee\VSCore" Case "NAIEPO" strProductSubKey = "Network Associates\ePolicy Orchestrator" Case "NAITVD" strProductSubKey = "Network Associates\TVD" Case Else strProductSubKey = False End Select
Const HKLM = &h80000002
strRootSoftwareKeyNative = "Software" strRootSoftwareKeyWow64 = "Software\Wow6432Node" If Not strProductSubKey = False Then ' Assume not in both places on a 64-bit machine If RegKeyExists(HKLM, strRootSoftwareKeyWow64&"\"&strProductSubKey) Then strProductKeyPath = strRootSoftwareKeyWow64&"\"&strProductSubKey ElseIf RegKeyExists(HKLM, strRootSoftwareKeyNative&"\"&strProductSubKey) Then strProductKeyPath = strRootSoftwareKeyNative&"\"&strProductSubKey End If Else strProductKeyPath = False End If
GetMcAfeeProductRegRootKey = strProductKeyPath
End Function 'GetMcAfeeProductRegRootKey
Function RegKeyExists(sHive, sRegKey) Dim aValueNames, aValueTypes If objReg.EnumValues(sHive, sRegKey, aValueNames, aValueTypes) = 0 Then RegKeyExists = True Else RegKeyExists = False End If End Function 'RegKeyExists

Dim objWMIService,strWMIQuery,colItems,objItem,strStartMode,strState

If colItems.Count = 0 Then ServiceState = "Not Installed" Else For Each objItem In colItems If objItem.State = "Stopped" Or objItem.State = "Paused" Then strState = objItem.State End If If objItem.StartMode = "Manual" Or objItem.StartMode = "Disabled" Then strStartMode = objItem.StartMode End If ServiceState = Trim(strState&" "&strStartMode) Next End If

Set objCtx = CreateObject("WbemScripting.SWbemNamedValueSet") objCtx.Add "__ProviderArchitecture", iArchType Set objLocator = CreateObject("Wbemscripting.SWbemLocator") Set objServices = objLocator.ConnectServer("","root\default","","",,,,objCtx) Set objRegProv = objServices.Get("StdRegProv")

sensor.name: Last Logged In User
sensor.description: If no user is logged in, returns the last user to log in is reported. If a user is currently logged in, that user is returned. Example: DOMAIN\Jane.Doe

query.script:
'======================================== ' Last Logged In User '========================================
' This sensor will report the user that was logged in the last time ' the sensor was run. If there is no user logged in, it will return ' the last user to log in. ' ' note - for this sensor to be effective, it must be reissued as a saved question
Option Explicit Const HKLM = &h80000002
Dim objWMIService, objReg, colComputer Dim objComputer, strLastUser, strLastLastUser
On Error Resume Next
Set objReg = GetObject("winmgmts:{impersonationLevel=impersonate}!\\.\root\default:StdRegProv")
' Get the last logged in user from registry strLastUser = GetLastUser(objReg)
If Err.Number <> 0 Then 'WScript.Echo "setting initially, line 24" & Err.Description Err.Number = 0 End If
Set objWMIService = GetObject("winmgmts:" & "{impersonationLevel=impersonate}!\\.\root\cimv2") Set colComputer = objWMIService.ExecQuery ("Select UserName from Win32_ComputerSystem")
For Each objComputer in colComputer If IsNull(strLastUser) Or strLastUser = "" Or strLastUser = False Then ' first run or error, try to set If Err.Number <> 0 Then ' WScript.Echo "line 34" & Err.Description Err.Number = 0 End If If objComputer.UserName <> "" Then 'someone is currently logged in If Err.Number <> 0 Then ' WScript.Echo "line 39" & Err.Description Err.Number = 0 End If SetLastUser objReg, objComputer.UserName
strLastUser = objComputer.UserName ' this may set to no value if nobody is logged in If Err.Number <> 0 Then ' WScript.Echo "setting on line 37" & Err.Description Err.Number = 0 End If Else ' nobody is logged in and it's not yet been run SetLastUser objReg,"Uninitialized - waiting for login" End If Else ' this has previously been set, overwrite the registry value if someone is logged in If objComputer.UserName <> "" Then ' if someone is logged in SetLastUser objReg, objComputer.UserName Else ' No one is logged in and it's been run before ' WScript.Echo "no user logged in and strLastUser is " & strLastUser SetLastUser objReg,"Uninitialized - waiting for login" End If End If
' whether anyone is logged in or nobody is logged in, echo out ' value in the registry which is either a login or the uninitialized phrase strLastUser = GetLastUser(objReg) ' pull again now that it's been set If Err.Number <> 0 Then 'WScript.Echo "setting again, line 52" & Err.Description Err.Number = 0 End If WScript.Echo strLastUser Next
' Cleanup Set colComputer = Nothing Set objWMIService = Nothing Set objReg = Nothing
Function GetLastUser(objRegistry) ' This function will look into the Tanium Registry Key to get the last logged in user
Const HKLM = &h80000002
Dim strLastUserRegValueData, strTaniumPath, Result
strTaniumPath = GetTaniumRegistryPath()
Result = objReg.GetStringValue(HKLM,strTaniumPath & "\Sensor Data","LastLoggedInUser",strLastUserRegValueData)
If strLastUserRegValueData = "" Then ' data is not initialized GetLastUser = False Else GetLastUser = strLastUserRegValueData End If
End Function 'GetLastUser
Function SetLastUser(objRegistry, strUserName) ' This function will look into the Tanium Registry Key to push the currently ' logged in user to the front of the array and push the previous last to the end
Const HKLM = &h80000002
Dim strTaniumPath, strLastUser
strTaniumPath = GetTaniumRegistryPath()
If Not RegKeyExists(objRegistry, HKLM, strTaniumPath & "\Sensor Data") Then objRegistry.CreateKey HKLM, strTaniumPath & "\Sensor Data" End If
objReg.SetStringValue HKLM,strTaniumPath & "\Sensor Data","LastLoggedInUser",strUserName
End Function 'SetLastUser
Function RegKeyExists(objRegistry, sHive, sRegKey) Dim aValueNames, aValueTypes If objRegistry.EnumValues(sHive, sRegKey, aValueNames, aValueTypes) = 0 Then RegKeyExists = True Else RegKeyExists = False End If End Function 'RegKeyExists
Function GetTaniumRegistryPath 'GetTaniumRegistryPath works in x64 or x32 'looks for a valid Path value
Dim objShell Dim keyNativePath, keyWoWPath, strPath, strFoundTaniumRegistryPath
Set objShell = CreateObject("WScript.Shell")
keyNativePath = "Software\Tanium\Tanium Client" keyWoWPath = "Software\Wow6432Node\Tanium\Tanium Client"
' first check the Software key (valid for 32-bit machines, or 64-bit machines in 32-bit mode) On Error Resume Next strPath = objShell.RegRead("HKLM\"&keyNativePath&"\Path") On Error Goto 0 strFoundTaniumRegistryPath = keyNativePath
If strPath = "" Then ' Could not find 32-bit mode path, checking Wow6432Node On Error Resume Next strPath = objShell.RegRead("HKLM\"&keyWoWPath&"\Path") On Error Goto 0 strFoundTaniumRegistryPath = keyWoWPath End If
If Not strPath = "" Then GetTaniumRegistryPath = strFoundTaniumRegistryPath Else GetTaniumRegistryPath = False WScript.Echo "Error: Cannot locate Tanium Registry Path" End If End Function 'GetTaniumRegistryPath

sensor.name: Stopped Service Short Name
sensor.description: A list of the short names of all services currently in the stopped state. Example: defragsvc

query.script: select Name from win32_Service where State='Stopped'

sensor.name: Forefront Client Realtime Monitoring Status
sensor.description: Indicates whether Forefront Realtime Monitoring is enabled. Example: enabled

query.script:
'======================================== ' Forefront Client Realtime Monitoring Status '========================================
Const HKLM = &h80000002 Set reg=Getx64RegistryProvider()
strKey = "Software\Microsoft\Microsoft Antimalware\Real-Time Protection" If Not RegKeyExists(reg, HKLM, strKey) Then strKey = "Software\Wow6432Node\Microsoft\Microsoft Antimalware\Real-Time Protection" End If
' check for windows defender (win 8 and >) If Not RegKeyExists(reg, HKLM, strKey) Then strKey = "Software\Microsoft\Windows Defender\Real-Time Protection" If Not RegKeyExists(reg, HKLM, strKey) Then strKey = "Software\Wow6432Node\Microsoft\Windows Defender\Real-Time Protection" End If End If
If RegKeyExists(reg, HKLM, strKey) Then reg.GetDWordValue HKLM, strKey, "DisableRealtimeMonitoring", strValue
If IsNull(strValue) Then WScript.Echo "Enabled" Else If strValue = "1" Then WScript.Echo "Disabled" Else WScript.Echo "Enabled" End If End If End If
Function RegKeyExists(objRegistry, sHive, sRegKey) Dim aValueNames, aValueTypes If objRegistry.EnumValues(sHive, sRegKey, aValueNames, aValueTypes) = 0 Then RegKeyExists = True Else RegKeyExists = False End If End Function

Set objCtx = CreateObject("WbemScripting.SWbemNamedValueSet") objCtx.Add "__ProviderArchitecture", iArchType Set objLocator = CreateObject("Wbemscripting.SWbemLocator") Set objServices = objLocator.ConnectServer("","root\default","","",,,,objCtx) Set objRegProv = objServices.Get("StdRegProv")
Set Getx64RegistryProvider = objRegProv End Function ' Getx64RegistryProvider

sensor.name: Forefront Last Scan Run Date
sensor.description: Indicates the last time that a scan was run

query.script:
'======================================== ' Forefront Client Last Scan Run '========================================
Const HKLM = &h80000002 Set reg=Getx64RegistryProvider()
'Uses date math - set locale
SetLocale(1033)
strKey = "Software\Microsoft\Microsoft Antimalware\Scan" If Not RegKeyExists(reg, HKLM, strKey) Then strKey = "Software\Wow6432Node\Microsoft\Microsoft Antimalware\Scan" End If
' check for windows defender (win 8 and >) If Not RegKeyExists(reg, HKLM, strKey) Then strKey = "Software\Microsoft\Windows Defender\Scan" If Not RegKeyExists(reg, HKLM, strKey) Then strKey = "Software\Wow6432Node\Microsoft\Windows Defender\Scan" End If End If
If RegKeyExists(reg, HKLM, strKey) Then reg.GetBinaryValue HKLM, strKey, "LastScanRun", binValue
If Not IsNull(binValue) Then WScript.Echo BinaryToDate(binValue) Else WScript.Echo "Date not found" End If Else WScript.Echo "Forefront Endpoint Protection not found" End If
Function BinaryToDate(Binary) Err.Clear
'Define Variants Dim lngHigh Dim lngLow Dim dtmDate Dim i
'Populate Variants lngHigh = 0 lngLow = 0
'NOTE: Portions of this code taken from: ' http://www.visualbasicscript.com/m30907.aspx
for i=7 to 4 step -1 lngHigh = lngHigh * 256 + Binary(i) next for i=3 to 0 step -1 lngLow = lngLow * 256 + Binary(i) next
if err.number<>0 then dtmDate = #1/1/1601# Err.Clear else If lngLow < 0 Then lngHigh = lngHigh + 1 End If If (lngHigh = 0) And (lngLow = 0 ) Then dtmDate = #1/1/1601# Else dtmDate = #1/1/1601# + (((lngHigh * (2 ^ 32)) _ + lngLow)/600000000 - GetTimeBias())/1440 End If End If BinaryToDate = dtmDate End Function
Function GetTimeBias() 'Define Variants Dim lngBiasKey Dim lngBias
' Obtain local Time Zone bias from machine registry. reg.GetDWORDValue HKLM, "System\CurrentControlSet\Control\TimeZoneInformation", "ActiveTimeBias", lngBiasKey If UCase(TypeName(lngBiasKey)) = "LONG" Then lngBias = lngBiasKey ElseIf UCase(TypeName(lngBiasKey)) = "VARIANT()" Then lngBias = 0 For k = 0 To UBound(lngBiasKey) lngBias = lngBias + (lngBiasKey(k) * 256^k) Next End If 'wscript.echo "lngBias = " & lngBias GetTimeBias = lngBias End Function
Function RegKeyExists(objRegistry, sHive, sRegKey) Dim aValueNames, aValueTypes If objRegistry.EnumValues(sHive, sRegKey, aValueNames, aValueTypes) = 0 Then RegKeyExists = True Else RegKeyExists = False End If End Function
Function Getx64RegistryProvider ' Returns the best available registry provider: 32 bit on 32 bit systems, 64 bit on 64 bit systems Dim objWMIService, colItems, objItem, iArchType, objCtx, objLocator, objServices, objRegProv Set objWMIService = GetObject("winmgmts:\\.\root\CIMV2") Set colItems = objWMIService.ExecQuery("Select SystemType from Win32_ComputerSystem") For Each objItem In colItems If InStr(LCase(objItem.SystemType), "x64") > 0 Then iArchType = 64 Else iArchType = 32 End If Next
Set objCtx = CreateObject("WbemScripting.SWbemNamedValueSet") objCtx.Add "__ProviderArchitecture", iArchType Set objLocator = CreateObject("Wbemscripting.SWbemLocator") Set objServices = objLocator.ConnectServer("","root\default","","",,,,objCtx) Set objRegProv = objServices.Get("StdRegProv")
Set Getx64RegistryProvider = objRegProv End Function ' Getx64RegistryProvider

query.script:
'======================================== ' Forefront Client Last Scan Type '========================================

'=============================================================== 'Function GetScanType will return a string with the scan type that corresponds to the enum ' Parameter: iScanType - type of scan ' Return: a VARIANT string containing text type of scan Function GetScanType(iScanType) Select case(iScanType) Case 1 : GetScanType= "Quick Scan" Case 2 : GetScanType= "Full Scan" Case Else GetScanType= "Invalid Scan type" End Select End Function

sensor.name: Forefront Client AV Signature Applied Days Old
sensor.description: Indicates how many days ago a new AS signature was applied. Example: 8

query.script:
'======================================== ' Forefront Client AS Signature Applied Days Old '========================================
Const HKLM = &h80000002 Set reg=Getx64RegistryProvider()
'Uses date math - set locale
SetLocale(1033)
strKey = "Software\Microsoft\Microsoft Antimalware\Signature Updates" If Not RegKeyExists(reg, HKLM, strKey) Then strKey = "Software\Wow6432Node\Microsoft\Microsoft Antimalware\Signature Updates" End If
' check for windows defender (win 8 and >) If Not RegKeyExists(reg, HKLM, strKey) Then strKey = "Software\Microsoft\Windows Defender\Signature Updates" If Not RegKeyExists(reg, HKLM, strKey) Then strKey = "Software\Wow6432Node\Microsoft\Windows Defender\Signature Updates" End If End If
If RegKeyExists(reg, HKLM, strKey) Then reg.GetBinaryValue HKLM, strKey, "AVSignatureApplied", binValue
If Not IsNull(binValue) Then words = Split(BinaryToDate(binValue)) WScript.Echo GetDaysOld(words(0)) Else WScript.Echo "Date not found" End If End If
'date format is MM/DD/YYYY function GetDaysOld(strDate) patternDate = CDate( strDate ) today = CDate( Month(Now) & "/" & Day(Now) & "/" & Year(Now)) GetDaysOld = DateDiff("d", patternDate, today) End Function
Function BinaryToDate(Binary) Err.Clear
'Define Variants Dim lngHigh Dim lngLow Dim dtmDate Dim i

if err.number<>0 then dtmDate = #1/1/1601# Err.Clear else If lngLow < 0 Then lngHigh = lngHigh + 1 End If If (lngHigh = 0) And (lngLow = 0 ) Then dtmDate = #1/1/1601# Else dtmDate = #1/1/1601# + (((lngHigh * (2 ^ 32)) _ + lngLow)/600000000 - GetTimeBias())/1440 End If End If BinaryToDate = dtmDate End Function

Set objCtx = CreateObject("WbemScripting.SWbemNamedValueSet") objCtx.Add "__ProviderArchitecture", iArchType Set objLocator = CreateObject("Wbemscripting.SWbemLocator") Set objServices = objLocator.ConnectServer("","root\default","","",,,,objCtx) Set objRegProv = objServices.Get("StdRegProv")

sensor.name: Forefront Client AS Signature Applied Days Old
sensor.description: Indicates how many days ago a new AS signature was applied. Example: 8

query.script:
'======================================== ' Forefront Client AS Signature Applied Days Old '========================================
Const HKLM = &h80000002 Set reg=Getx64RegistryProvider()
'Uses date math - set locale
SetLocale(1033)
strKey = "Software\Microsoft\Microsoft Antimalware\Signature Updates" If Not RegKeyExists(reg, HKLM, strKey) Then strKey = "Software\Wow6432Node\Microsoft\Microsoft Antimalware\Signature Updates" End If
' check for windows defender (win 8 and >) If Not RegKeyExists(reg, HKLM, strKey) Then strKey = "Software\Microsoft\Windows Defender\Signature Updates" If Not RegKeyExists(reg, HKLM, strKey) Then strKey = "Software\Wow6432Node\Microsoft\Windows Defender\Signature Updates" End If End If
If RegKeyExists(reg, HKLM, strKey) Then reg.GetBinaryValue HKLM, strKey, "ASSignatureApplied", binValue
If Not IsNull(binValue) Then words = Split(BinaryToDate(binValue)) WScript.Echo GetDaysOld(words(0)) Else WScript.Echo "Date not found" End If End If
'date format is MM/DD/YYYY function GetDaysOld(strDate) patternDate = CDate( strDate ) today = CDate( Month(Now) & "/" & Day(Now) & "/" & Year(Now)) GetDaysOld = DateDiff("d", patternDate, today) End Function
Function BinaryToDate(Binary) Err.Clear
'Define Variants Dim lngHigh Dim lngLow Dim dtmDate Dim i
'Populate Variants lngHigh = 0 lngLow = 0
'NOTE: Portions of this code taken from: ' http://www.visualbasicscript.com/m30907.aspx
for i=7 to 4 step -1 lngHigh = lngHigh * 256 + Binary(i) next for i=3 to 0 step -1 lngLow = lngLow * 256 + Binary(i) next
if err.number<>0 then dtmDate = #1/1/1601# Err.Clear else If lngLow < 0 Then lngHigh = lngHigh + 1 End If If (lngHigh = 0) And (lngLow = 0 ) Then dtmDate = #1/1/1601# Else dtmDate = #1/1/1601# + (((lngHigh * (2 ^ 32)) _ + lngLow)/600000000 - GetTimeBias())/1440 End If End If BinaryToDate = dtmDate End Function
Function GetTimeBias() 'Define Variants Dim lngBiasKey Dim lngBias
' Obtain local Time Zone bias from machine registry. reg.GetDWORDValue HKLM, "System\CurrentControlSet\Control\TimeZoneInformation", "ActiveTimeBias", lngBiasKey If UCase(TypeName(lngBiasKey)) = "LONG" Then lngBias = lngBiasKey ElseIf UCase(TypeName(lngBiasKey)) = "VARIANT()" Then lngBias = 0 For k = 0 To UBound(lngBiasKey) lngBias = lngBias + (lngBiasKey(k) * 256^k) Next End If 'wscript.echo "lngBias = " & lngBias GetTimeBias = lngBias End Function
Function RegKeyExists(objRegistry, sHive, sRegKey) Dim aValueNames, aValueTypes If objRegistry.EnumValues(sHive, sRegKey, aValueNames, aValueTypes) = 0 Then RegKeyExists = True Else RegKeyExists = False End If End Function
Function Getx64RegistryProvider ' Returns the best available registry provider: 32 bit on 32 bit systems, 64 bit on 64 bit systems Dim objWMIService, colItems, objItem, iArchType, objCtx, objLocator, objServices, objRegProv Set objWMIService = GetObject("winmgmts:\\.\root\CIMV2") Set colItems = objWMIService.ExecQuery("Select SystemType from Win32_ComputerSystem") For Each objItem In colItems If InStr(LCase(objItem.SystemType), "x64") > 0 Then iArchType = 64 Else iArchType = 32 End If Next
Set objCtx = CreateObject("WbemScripting.SWbemNamedValueSet") objCtx.Add "__ProviderArchitecture", iArchType Set objLocator = CreateObject("Wbemscripting.SWbemLocator") Set objServices = objLocator.ConnectServer("","root\default","","",,,,objCtx) Set objRegProv = objServices.Get("StdRegProv")
Set Getx64RegistryProvider = objRegProv End Function ' Getx64RegistryProvider

sensor.name: Forefront Client Version
sensor.description: The version of the Forefront client on the client machine

query.script:
'======================================== ' Forefront Client Version '========================================
Const HKLM = &h80000002 Set reg=Getx64RegistryProvider()
strKey = "Software\Microsoft\Microsoft Antimalware" If Not RegKeyExists(reg, HKLM, strKey) Then strKey = "Software\Wow6432Node\Microsoft\Microsoft Antimalware" End If
If RegKeyExists(reg, HKLM, strKey) Then reg.GetStringValue HKLM, strKey, "InstallLocation", strValue
If Not IsNull(strValue) Then fileToCheck = strValue & "\msmpeng.exe" Set objFSO = CreateObject("Scripting.FileSystemObject") WScript.Echo objFso.GetFileVersion(fileToCheck) Else WScript.Echo "Client version not found" End If Else ' check for windows defender CheckWindowsDefender End If
Sub CheckWindowsDefender strPath = "c:\program files\windows defender\MsMpEng.exe" Set objFSO = CreateObject("Scripting.FileSystemObject") If objfso.FileExists(strPath) Then WScript.Echo objFSO.GetFileVersion(strPath) Else WScript.Echo "Client version not found" End If End Sub
Function RegKeyExists(objRegistry, sHive, sRegKey) Dim aValueNames, aValueTypes If objRegistry.EnumValues(sHive, sRegKey, aValueNames, aValueTypes) = 0 Then RegKeyExists = True Else RegKeyExists = False End If End Function

Set objCtx = CreateObject("WbemScripting.SWbemNamedValueSet") objCtx.Add "__ProviderArchitecture", iArchType Set objLocator = CreateObject("Wbemscripting.SWbemLocator") Set objServices = objLocator.ConnectServer("","root\default","","",,,,objCtx) Set objRegProv = objServices.Get("StdRegProv")
Set Getx64RegistryProvider = objRegProv End Function ' Getx64RegistryProvider

sensor.name: Forefront Scheduled Scan Enabled
sensor.description: Indicates if a Scheduled Scan is enabled or not

query.script:
'======================================== ' Forefront Client Scheduled Scan Enabled '========================================
Const HKLM = &h80000002 Set reg=Getx64RegistryProvider()
'Uses date math - set locale
SetLocale(1033)
strKey = "Software\Microsoft\Microsoft Antimalware\Scan" If Not RegKeyExists(reg, HKLM, strKey) Then strKey = "Software\Wow6432Node\Microsoft\Microsoft Antimalware\Scan" End If
' check for windows defender (win 8 and >) If Not RegKeyExists(reg, HKLM, strKey) Then strKey = "Software\Microsoft\Windows Defender\Scan" If Not RegKeyExists(reg, HKLM, strKey) Then strKey = "Software\Wow6432Node\Microsoft\Windows Defender\Scan" End If dIsDefender = 1 End If
If RegKeyExists(reg, HKLM, strKey) Then reg.GetDWORDValue HKLM, strKey, "ScheduleDay", dValue
If Not IsNull(dValue) Then If dValue = 8 Then WScript.Echo "No" Else WScript.Echo "Yes" End If Else if dIsDefender =1 then WScript.Echo "No Scheduled Scan: Windows Defender" else WScript.Echo "Scan Type not found" end if End If Else WScript.Echo "Forefront Endpoint Protection not found" End If
Function RegKeyExists(objRegistry, sHive, sRegKey) Dim aValueNames, aValueTypes If objRegistry.EnumValues(sHive, sRegKey, aValueNames, aValueTypes) = 0 Then RegKeyExists = True Else RegKeyExists = False End If End Function

Set objCtx = CreateObject("WbemScripting.SWbemNamedValueSet") objCtx.Add "__ProviderArchitecture", iArchType Set objLocator = CreateObject("Wbemscripting.SWbemLocator") Set objServices = objLocator.ConnectServer("","root\default","","",,,,objCtx) Set objRegProv = objServices.Get("StdRegProv")
Set Getx64RegistryProvider = objRegProv End Function ' Getx64RegistryProvider

sensor.name: Forefront Scheduled Scan Type
sensor.description: Indicates the Scheduled Scan Type

query.script:
'======================================== ' Forefront Client Scheduled Scan Type '========================================
Const HKLM = &h80000002 Set reg=Getx64RegistryProvider()
'Uses date math - set locale
SetLocale(1033)
strKey = "Software\Microsoft\Microsoft Antimalware\Scan" If Not RegKeyExists(reg, HKLM, strKey) Then strKey = "Software\Wow6432Node\Microsoft\Microsoft Antimalware\Scan" End If
' check for windows defender (win 8 and >) If Not RegKeyExists(reg, HKLM, strKey) Then strKey = "Software\Microsoft\Windows Defender\Scan" If Not RegKeyExists(reg, HKLM, strKey) Then strKey = "Software\Wow6432Node\Microsoft\Windows Defender\Scan" End If dIsDefender = 1 End If
If RegKeyExists(reg, HKLM, strKey) Then reg.GetDWORDValue HKLM, strKey, "ScanParameters", dValue
If Not IsNull(dValue) Then If dValue = 1 Then WScript.Echo "Quick Scan" Else WScript.Echo "Full Scan" End If Else If dIsDefender = 1 Then WScript.Echo "No Scheduled Scan: Windows Defender" Else WScript.Echo "Quick Scan" End If End If Else WScript.Echo "Forefront Endpoint Protection not found" End If
Function RegKeyExists(objRegistry, sHive, sRegKey) Dim aValueNames, aValueTypes If objRegistry.EnumValues(sHive, sRegKey, aValueNames, aValueTypes) = 0 Then RegKeyExists = True Else RegKeyExists = False End If End Function

Set objCtx = CreateObject("WbemScripting.SWbemNamedValueSet") objCtx.Add "__ProviderArchitecture", iArchType Set objLocator = CreateObject("Wbemscripting.SWbemLocator") Set objServices = objLocator.ConnectServer("","root\default","","",,,,objCtx) Set objRegProv = objServices.Get("StdRegProv")
Set Getx64RegistryProvider = objRegProv End Function ' Getx64RegistryProvider

SetLocale(1033)
strKey = "Software\Microsoft\Microsoft Antimalware\Scan" If Not RegKeyExists(reg, HKLM, strKey) Then strKey = "Software\Wow6432Node\Microsoft\Microsoft Antimalware\Scan" End If
' check for windows defender (win 8 and >) If Not RegKeyExists(reg, HKLM, strKey) Then strKey = "Software\Microsoft\Windows Defender\Scan" If Not RegKeyExists(reg, HKLM, strKey) Then strKey = "Software\Wow6432Node\Microsoft\Windows Defender\Scan" End If dIsDefender = 1 End If
If RegKeyExists(reg, HKLM, strKey) Then reg.GetDWORDValue HKLM, strKey, "ScheduleTime", dValue
If Not IsNull(dValue) Then If dvalue = 0 Then WScript.Echo "12:00 AM" Else ' need to divide by 60 to get ' the hour dHour = dvalue / 60 dTT = "AM"
If dhour > 12 Then dhour = dhour - 12 dTT = "PM" End If
WScript.Echo dhour & ":00 " & dTT End If ' divide by 60 to get the hour Else if dIsDefender = 1 then wscript.echo "No Scheduled Scan: Windows Defender" else WScript.Echo "2:00 AM" end if End If Else WScript.Echo "Forefront Endpoint Protection not found" End If
Function RegKeyExists(objRegistry, sHive, sRegKey) Dim aValueNames, aValueTypes If objRegistry.EnumValues(sHive, sRegKey, aValueNames, aValueTypes) = 0 Then RegKeyExists = True Else RegKeyExists = False End If End Function
Function Getx64RegistryProvider ' Returns the best available registry provider: 32 bit on 32 bit systems, 64 bit on 64 bit systems Dim objWMIService, colItems, objItem, iArchType, objCtx, objLocator, objServices, objRegProv Set objWMIService = GetObject("winmgmts:\\.\root\CIMV2") Set colItems = objWMIService.ExecQuery("Select SystemType from Win32_ComputerSystem") For Each objItem In colItems If InStr(LCase(objItem.SystemType), "x64") > 0 Then iArchType = 64 Else iArchType = 32 End If Next
Set objCtx = CreateObject("WbemScripting.SWbemNamedValueSet") objCtx.Add "__ProviderArchitecture", iArchType Set objLocator = CreateObject("Wbemscripting.SWbemLocator") Set objServices = objLocator.ConnectServer("","root\default","","",,,,objCtx) Set objRegProv = objServices.Get("StdRegProv")
Set Getx64RegistryProvider = objRegProv End Function ' Getx64RegistryProvider

sensor.name: Sophos Client Health
sensor.description: Shows the details of two sophos services: sophos anti-virus and the sophos autoupdate service. Example: Service | StartMode | State | Healthy

query.script:
'======================================== ' Sophos Client Health '========================================
' This sensor will return the status of the sophos services ' and make a health determination ' output looks like
Option Explicit
Dim strSep
strSep = "|"
GetSophosClientStatus(strSep)
Function GetSophosClientStatus(strSep) ' This function will echo back the details of two sophos services: ' sophos anti-virus and the sophos autoupdate service. ' The output will look like: ' Service|StartMode|State|Healthy
Dim objWMIService, colItems Dim strComputer, strServiceDisplayName, strMainServiceStartMode, strMainServiceState Dim strUpdateServiceStartMode, strUpdateServiceState, strHealthy Dim objItem
strComputer = "."
Set objWMIService = GetObject("winmgmts:\\" & strComputer & "\root\cimv2")
' First the main service strMainServiceStartMode = "" strMainServiceState = "" strServiceDisplayName = "sophos anti-virus"
Set colItems = objWMIService.ExecQuery("Select * from Win32_Service where DisplayName" _ & " = '"&strServiceDisplayName&"'") If (colItems.Count > 0 )Then For Each objItem in colItems strMainServiceStartMode = objItem.StartMode strMainServiceState = objItem.State Next Else strMainServiceStartMode = "Not Installed" strMainServiceState = "Not Installed" End If
If LCase(strMainServiceStartMode) = "auto" And LCase(strMainServiceState) = "running" Then strHealthy = "Yes" Else strHealthy = "No" End If ' part one of sensor output WScript.Echo strServiceDisplayName & strSep & strMainServiceStartMode _ & strSep & strMainServiceState & strSep & strHealthy
' Next the sophos auto update service
strUpdateServiceStartMode = "" strUpdateServiceState = "" strServiceDisplayName = "sophos autoupdate service"
Set colItems = objWMIService.ExecQuery("Select * from Win32_Service where DisplayName" _ & " = '"&strServiceDisplayName&"'") If ( colItems.Count > 0 ) Then For Each objItem in colItems strUpdateServiceStartMode = objItem.StartMode strUpdateServiceState = objItem.State Next Else strUpdateServiceStartMode = "Not Installed" strUpdateServiceState = "Not Installed" End If
If LCase(strUpdateServiceStartMode) = "auto" And LCase(strUpdateServiceState) = "running" Then strHealthy = "Yes" Else strHealthy = "No" End If WScript.Echo strServiceDisplayName & strSep & strUpdateServiceStartMode _ & strSep & strUpdateServiceState & strSep & strHealthy
'Cleanup Set colItems = Nothing Set objWMIService = Nothing
End Function 'GetSophosClientStatus

sensor.name: Sophos Client Version
sensor.description: Returns the version of Sophos anti-virus installed on the client machine. Example: 4.80.0

query.script:
'======================================== ' Sophos Client Version '========================================
strComputer = "." Set objRegistry = _ GetObject("winmgmts:{impersonationLevel=impersonate}!\\" _ & strComputer & "\root\default:StdRegProv")
Const HKLM = &H80000002
keyPath = "Software\Sophos" key64Path = "Software\WOW6432Node\Sophos"
If Not RegKeyExists(HKLM, keyPath) Then keyPath = key64Path
If Not RegKeyExists(HKLM, keyPath) Then WScript.Echo "Not installed" WScript.Quit End If End If
If RegKeyExists(HKLM, keyPath & "\SAVService\Application") Then WScript.Echo GetVersion(keyPath & "\SAVService\Application")
Else WScript.Echo "Version not found" End If
Function GetVersion(fullKeyPath) objRegistry.GetStringValue HKLM,fullKeyPath ,"Path", strDir If Not IsNull(strDir) Then strExe = "SavMain.exe" Set theFso = CreateObject("Scripting.FileSystemObject")
If theFso.FileExists(strDir & strExe) Then WScript.Echo GetFileVersion(strDir & strExe) WScript.Quit End If
GetVersion = strVersion Exit Function End If
GetVersion = "Version not found" End Function
function GetFileVersion(theFile) dim theFso, theVer set theFso = CreateObject("Scripting.FileSystemObject")
theVer = theFso.getFileVersion(theFile)
if theVer = "" then theVer = "-1" end If
getFileVersion = theVer end Function
Function RegKeyExists(sHive, sRegKey) Dim aValueNames, aValueTypes If objRegistry.EnumValues(sHive, sRegKey, aValueNames, aValueTypes) = 0 Then RegKeyExists = True Else RegKeyExists = False End If End Function

sensor.name: Sophos Engine Version
sensor.description: The engine version of Sophos AV installed on the client machine. Example: 4.80.0

query.script:
'======================================== ' Sophos Engine Version '========================================
' This sensor will return the value of the sophos AV detection engine
Set objRegistry = Getx64RegistryProvider()
Const HKLM = &H80000002
keyPath = "Software\Sophos" key64Path = "Software\WOW6432Node\Sophos"
If Not RegKeyExists(HKLM, keyPath) Then keyPath = key64Path
If Not RegKeyExists(HKLM, keyPath) Then WScript.Echo "Not installed" WScript.Quit End If End If
If RegKeyExists(HKLM, keyPath & "\SAVService\Application") Then WScript.Echo GetVersion(keyPath & "\SAVService\Application") Else WScript.Echo "Sophos Registry Not Found" WScript.Quit End If
Function GetVersion(fullKeyPath) objRegistry.GetStringValue HKLM,fullKeyPath ,"Path", strDir If Not IsNull(strDir) Then strFile = "veex.dll" Set theFso = CreateObject("Scripting.FileSystemObject")
If theFso.FileExists(strDir & strFile) Then WScript.Echo GetFileVersion(strDir & strFile) Else WScript.Echo "Engine File Not Found" End If Else GetVersion = "Sophos Path Registry Value Not Found" End If End Function
Function GetFileVersion(theFile) dim theFso, theVer set theFso = CreateObject("Scripting.FileSystemObject")
theVer = theFso.getFileVersion(theFile)
if theVer = "" then theVer = "-1" end If
getFileVersion = theVer end Function
Function RegKeyExists(sHive, sRegKey) Dim aValueNames, aValueTypes If objRegistry.EnumValues(sHive, sRegKey, aValueNames, aValueTypes) = 0 Then RegKeyExists = True Else RegKeyExists = False End If End Function
Function Getx64RegistryProvider ' Returns the best available registry provider: 32 bit on 32 bit systems, 64 bit on 64 bit systems Dim objWMIService, colItems, objItem, iArchType, objCtx, objLocator, objServices, objRegProv Set objWMIService = GetObject("winmgmts:\\.\root\CIMV2") Set colItems = objWMIService.ExecQuery("Select SystemType from Win32_ComputerSystem") For Each objItem In colItems If InStr(LCase(objItem.SystemType), "x64") > 0 Then iArchType = 64 Else iArchType = 32 End If Next
Set objCtx = CreateObject("WbemScripting.SWbemNamedValueSet") objCtx.Add "__ProviderArchitecture", iArchType Set objLocator = CreateObject("Wbemscripting.SWbemLocator") Set objServices = objLocator.ConnectServer("","root\default","","",,,,objCtx) Set objRegProv = objServices.Get("StdRegProv")
Set Getx64RegistryProvider = objRegProv End Function ' Getx64RegistryProvider

sensor.name: Sophos Last Update Time
sensor.description: The last time that Sophos AV was updated on the client machine. Example: 2006-11-07T18:00:000Z

query.script:
'======================================== ' Sophos Last Update Time '========================================
' This sensor will read a registry key and determine the last time ' the software updated itself.
Option Explicit
' return the time WScript.Echo GetSophosLastUpdateTime
Function GetSophosLastUpdateTime ' This function returns a time, in UTC, which is the last ' successful update of Sophos
Const HKLM = &H80000002
Dim objRegistry Dim keyPath, key64Path, tZ, strFullKeyPath Dim dwordLastUpdateTime
Set objRegistry = Getx64RegistryProvider()
keyPath = "Software\Sophos" key64Path = "Software\WOW6432Node\Sophos"
If Not RegKeyExists(objRegistry, HKLM, keyPath) Then keyPath = key64Path
If Not RegKeyExists(objRegistry, HKLM, keyPath) Then WScript.Echo "Not installed" WScript.Quit End If End If
tZ = GetClientTimeZoneBias 'time relative to GMT strFullKeyPath = keyPath & "\AutoUpdate\UpdateStatus"
If RegKeyExists(objRegistry, HKLM, strFullKeyPath) Then objRegistry.GetDWORDValue HKLM, strFullKeyPath ,"LastUpdateTime", dwordLastUpdateTime GetSophosLastUpdateTime = DateAdd("h",tZ,(DateAdd("s",dwordLastUpdateTime,"01/01/1970 00:00:00"))) Else WScript.Echo "Last Update Time Not Found" End If End Function ' GetSophosLastUpdateTime
Function GetClientTimeZoneBias ' This will return the hour offset from GMT to be used in date math Dim objWMIService, colItems Dim strComputer, objItem
strComputer = "." Set objWMIService = GetObject("winmgmts:" _ & "{impersonationLevel=impersonate}!\\" & strComputer & "\root\cimv2")
Set colItems = objWMIService.ExecQuery("Select * from Win32_TimeZone")
For Each objItem in colItems 'Looks like -480 GetClientTimeZoneBias = objItem.Bias / 60 Next
' Cleanup Set colItems = Nothing Set objWMIService = Nothing End Function 'GetClientTimeZoneOffset
Function RegKeyExists(objRegistry, sHive, sRegKey) Dim aValueNames, aValueTypes If objRegistry.EnumValues(sHive, sRegKey, aValueNames, aValueTypes) = 0 Then RegKeyExists = True Else RegKeyExists = False End If End Function
Function Getx64RegistryProvider ' Returns the best available registry provider: 32 bit on 32 bit systems, 64 bit on 64 bit systems Dim objWMIService, colItems, objItem, iArchType, objCtx, objLocator, objServices, objRegProv Set objWMIService = GetObject("winmgmts:\\.\root\CIMV2") Set colItems = objWMIService.ExecQuery("Select SystemType from Win32_ComputerSystem") For Each objItem In colItems If InStr(LCase(objItem.SystemType), "x64") > 0 Then iArchType = 64 Else iArchType = 32 End If Next
Set objCtx = CreateObject("WbemScripting.SWbemNamedValueSet") objCtx.Add "__ProviderArchitecture", iArchType Set objLocator = CreateObject("Wbemscripting.SWbemLocator") Set objServices = objLocator.ConnectServer("","root\default","","",,,,objCtx) Set objRegProv = objServices.Get("StdRegProv")
Set Getx64RegistryProvider = objRegProv End Function ' Getx64RegistryProvider

query.script:
'======================================== ' Sophos Last Scan Time '========================================

Option Explicit
' return the time WScript.Echo GetSophosLastScanTime
Function GetSophosLastScanTime ' This function returns a time, in UTC, which is the last ' successful update of Sophos

Function RegKeyExists(objRegistry, sHive, sRegKey) Dim aValueNames, aValueTypes If objRegistry.EnumValues(sHive, sRegKey, aValueNames, aValueTypes) = 0 Then RegKeyExists = True Else RegKeyExists = False End If End Function

sensor.name: Sophos Controlled App Detected
sensor.description: Returns True or False whether Sophos AV Controlled App detection is installed. Example: True

query.script:
'======================================== ' Sophos Controlled App Detected '========================================
' This sensor will read a registry key and determine if the machine ' has a Controlled App detection according to Sophos AV
Option Explicit
' return the time WScript.Echo GetSophosControlledAppDetected
Function GetSophosControlledAppDetected ' This function returns a time, in UTC, which is the last ' successful update of Sophos
Const HKLM = &H80000002
Dim objRegistry Dim keyPath, key64Path, strFullKeyPath Dim dwordControlledAppDetected
Set objRegistry = Getx64RegistryProvider()
keyPath = "Software\Sophos" key64Path = "Software\WOW6432Node\Sophos"
If Not RegKeyExists(objRegistry, HKLM, keyPath) Then keyPath = key64Path
If Not RegKeyExists(objRegistry, HKLM, keyPath) Then WScript.Echo "Not installed" WScript.Quit End If End If
strFullKeyPath = keyPath & "\SAVService\Status\Infected"
If RegKeyExists(objRegistry, HKLM, strFullKeyPath) Then objRegistry.GetDWORDValue HKLM, strFullKeyPath ,"ControlledAppDetected", dwordControlledAppDetected If Not IsNull(dwordControlledAppDetected) And dwordControlledAppDetected = 0 Then GetSophosControlledAppDetected = "False" ElseIf Not IsNull(dwordControlledAppDetected) And dwordControlledAppDetected > 0 Then GetSophosControlledAppDetected = "True" Else GetSophosControlledAppDetected = "ControlledAppDetected Registry Value Not Found" 'This should never happen End If Else WScript.Echo "SAVService\Status\Infected Registry Value Not Found" End If End Function ' GetSophosControlledAppDetected
Function RegKeyExists(objRegistry, sHive, sRegKey) Dim aValueNames, aValueTypes If objRegistry.EnumValues(sHive, sRegKey, aValueNames, aValueTypes) = 0 Then RegKeyExists = True Else RegKeyExists = False End If End Function
Function Getx64RegistryProvider ' Returns the best available registry provider: 32 bit on 32 bit systems, 64 bit on 64 bit systems Dim objWMIService, colItems, objItem, iArchType, objCtx, objLocator, objServices, objRegProv Set objWMIService = GetObject("winmgmts:\\.\root\CIMV2") Set colItems = objWMIService.ExecQuery("Select SystemType from Win32_ComputerSystem") For Each objItem In colItems If InStr(LCase(objItem.SystemType), "x64") > 0 Then iArchType = 64 Else iArchType = 32 End If Next
Set objCtx = CreateObject("WbemScripting.SWbemNamedValueSet") objCtx.Add "__ProviderArchitecture", iArchType Set objLocator = CreateObject("Wbemscripting.SWbemLocator") Set objServices = objLocator.ConnectServer("","root\default","","",,,,objCtx) Set objRegProv = objServices.Get("StdRegProv")
Set Getx64RegistryProvider = objRegProv End Function ' Getx64RegistryProvider

query.script:
'======================================== ' Sophos Malware Detected '========================================
' This sensor will read a registry key and determine if the machine ' has a malware detection / infection according to Sophos AV
Option Explicit
' return the time WScript.Echo GetSophosInfected
Function GetSophosInfected ' This function returns a time, in UTC, which is the last ' successful update of Sophos
Const HKLM = &H80000002
Dim objRegistry Dim keyPath, key64Path, strFullKeyPath Dim dwordMalwareDetected
Set objRegistry = Getx64RegistryProvider()
keyPath = "Software\Sophos" key64Path = "Software\WOW6432Node\Sophos"

strFullKeyPath = keyPath & "\SAVService\Status\Infected"
If RegKeyExists(objRegistry, HKLM, strFullKeyPath) Then objRegistry.GetDWORDValue HKLM, strFullKeyPath ,"MalwareDetected", dwordMalwareDetected If Not IsNull(dwordMalwareDetected) And dwordMalwareDetected = 0 Then GetSophosInfected = "False" ElseIf Not IsNull(dwordMalwareDetected) And dwordMalwareDetected > 0 Then GetSophosInfected = "True" Else GetSophosInfected = "MalwareDetected Registry Value Not Found" 'This should never happen End If Else WScript.Echo "SAVService\Status\Infected Registry Value Not Found" End If End Function ' GetSophosInfected
Function RegKeyExists(objRegistry, sHive, sRegKey) Dim aValueNames, aValueTypes If objRegistry.EnumValues(sHive, sRegKey, aValueNames, aValueTypes) = 0 Then RegKeyExists = True Else RegKeyExists = False End If End Function

Set objCtx = CreateObject("WbemScripting.SWbemNamedValueSet") objCtx.Add "__ProviderArchitecture", iArchType Set objLocator = CreateObject("Wbemscripting.SWbemLocator") Set objServices = objLocator.ConnectServer("","root\default","","",,,,objCtx) Set objRegProv = objServices.Get("StdRegProv")

sensor.name: Sophos Potentially Unwanted Program Detected
sensor.description: Returns True or False if Sophos AV has detected a potentially unwanted program. Example: True

query.script:
'======================================== ' Sophos Potentially Unwanted Program Detected '========================================
' This sensor will read a registry key and determine if the machine ' has a PUA detection according to Sophos AV
Option Explicit
' return the time WScript.Echo GetSophosPUADetected
Function GetSophosPUADetected ' This function returns a time, in UTC, which is the last ' successful update of Sophos
Const HKLM = &H80000002
Dim objRegistry Dim keyPath, key64Path, strFullKeyPath Dim dwordPUADetected
Set objRegistry = Getx64RegistryProvider()
keyPath = "Software\Sophos" key64Path = "Software\WOW6432Node\Sophos"
If Not RegKeyExists(objRegistry, HKLM, keyPath) Then keyPath = key64Path
If Not RegKeyExists(objRegistry, HKLM, keyPath) Then WScript.Echo "Not installed" WScript.Quit End If End If
strFullKeyPath = keyPath & "\SAVService\Status\Infected"
If RegKeyExists(objRegistry, HKLM, strFullKeyPath) Then objRegistry.GetDWORDValue HKLM, strFullKeyPath ,"PUADetected", dwordPUADetected If Not IsNull(dwordPUADetected) And dwordPUADetected = 0 Then GetSophosPUADetected = "False" ElseIf Not IsNull(dwordPUADetected) And dwordPUADetected > 0 Then GetSophosPUADetected = "True" Else GetSophosPUADetected = "PUADetected Registry Value Not Found" 'This should never happen End If Else WScript.Echo "SAVService\Status\Infected Registry Value Not Found" End If End Function ' GetSophosPUADetected
Function RegKeyExists(objRegistry, sHive, sRegKey) Dim aValueNames, aValueTypes If objRegistry.EnumValues(sHive, sRegKey, aValueNames, aValueTypes) = 0 Then RegKeyExists = True Else RegKeyExists = False End If End Function
Function Getx64RegistryProvider ' Returns the best available registry provider: 32 bit on 32 bit systems, 64 bit on 64 bit systems Dim objWMIService, colItems, objItem, iArchType, objCtx, objLocator, objServices, objRegProv Set objWMIService = GetObject("winmgmts:\\.\root\CIMV2") Set colItems = objWMIService.ExecQuery("Select SystemType from Win32_ComputerSystem") For Each objItem In colItems If InStr(LCase(objItem.SystemType), "x64") > 0 Then iArchType = 64 Else iArchType = 32 End If Next
Set objCtx = CreateObject("WbemScripting.SWbemNamedValueSet") objCtx.Add "__ProviderArchitecture", iArchType Set objLocator = CreateObject("Wbemscripting.SWbemLocator") Set objServices = objLocator.ConnectServer("","root\default","","",,,,objCtx) Set objRegProv = objServices.Get("StdRegProv")
Set Getx64RegistryProvider = objRegProv End Function ' Getx64RegistryProvider
