'======================================== ' Queued Patches '========================================
Option Explicit
Dim objFSO, fn, objReadFile, contents, path, strSep, hasOutput strSep = "|"
'title|severity|bulletins|date|download|filename|status|package size|kb|cve
path = GetTaniumDir("Tools\Scans") Set objFSO = CreateObject("Scripting.FileSystemObject") fn = path & "\patchresultsreadable.txt"
If objFSO.FileExists(fn) Then Set objReadFile = objFSO.OpenTextFile(fn, 1, False)
Dim strLine, words, strFilename, strPatchDir, arrFilenames, isComplete
hasOutput = False
Do While Not objReadFile.AtEndOfStream strLine = objReadFile.ReadLine
'CHECK FOR MULTI-URL PATCHES words = Split(strLine, strSep)
'Ignore old Patch Results format without separator If UBound(words) < 4 Then If left(words(0), 4) = "Scan" Then hasOutput = True WScript.Echo words(0) 'Else ' WScript.Echo "Run upgraded Patch Scan" ' WScript.Quit End If ' ElseIf InStr(strDownload, ",") = 0 And InStr(strDownload, " ") = 0 Then Else arrFilenames = Split(words(5), ",") 'patch filename must be in Tools\Patch directory for queue Dim fso Set fso = WScript.CreateObject("Scripting.Filesystemobject")
strPatchDir = GetTaniumDir("Tools\Patches")
isComplete = True For Each strFilename In arrFilenames If Not fso.FileExists(strPatchDir & "\" & strFilename) Then isComplete = False End If Next
If Not isComplete Then hasOutput = True If InStr(strLine, "Already Installed") Then if InStr(strLine, "(KB") Then strLine = Replace(strLine, "Already Installed", "KB Already Installed") End If 'Do not echo since we only want to output "Queued" patches 'WScript.Echo strLine ' Else 'Do not echo since we only want to output "Queued" patches End If Else 'If we're here, update has been queued If InStr(strLine, "Not Installed") Then strLine = Replace(strLine, "Not Installed", "Queued") WScript.Echo strLine End If End If End If Loop
If Not hasOutput Then WScript.Echo "All available patches queued for installation" End If
objReadFile.close Else Wscript.echo "Patch results output not found" End if WScript.Quit()
Function GetTaniumDir(strSubDir) 'GetTaniumDir with GeneratePath, works in x64 or x32 'looks for a valid Path value
Dim objShell Dim keyNativePath, keyWoWPath, strPath
Set objShell = CreateObject("WScript.Shell")
keyNativePath = "HKLM\Software\Tanium\Tanium Client" keyWoWPath = "HKLM\Software\Wow6432Node\Tanium\Tanium Client"
' first check the Software key (valid for 32-bit machines, or 64-bit machines in 32-bit mode) On Error Resume Next strPath = objShell.RegRead(keyNativePath&"\Path") On Error Goto 0
If strPath = "" Then ' Could not find 32-bit mode path, checking Wow6432Node On Error Resume Next strPath = objShell.RegRead(keyWoWPath&"\Path") On Error Goto 0 End If
If Not strPath = "" Then If strSubDir <> "" Then strSubDir = "\" & strSubDir End If
Dim fso Set fso = WScript.CreateObject("Scripting.Filesystemobject") If fso.FolderExists(strPath) Then If Not fso.FolderExists(strPath & strSubDir) Then ''Need to loop through strSubDir and create all sub directories GeneratePath strPath & strSubDir, fso End If GetTaniumDir = strPath & strSubDir & "\" Else ' Specified Path doesn't exist on the filesystem WScript.Echo "Error: " & strPath & " does not exist on the filesystem" GetTaniumDir = False End If Else WScript.Echo "Error: Cannot find Tanium Client path in Registry" GetTaniumDir = False End If End Function 'GetTaniumDir
Function GeneratePath(pFolderPath, fso) GeneratePath = False
If Not fso.FolderExists(pFolderPath) Then If GeneratePath(fso.GetParentFolderName(pFolderPath), fso) Then GeneratePath = True Call fso.CreateFolder(pFolderPath) End If Else GeneratePath = True End If End Function 'GeneratePath

sensor.name: x64/x86?
sensor.description: Returns whether the client machine is 64-bit or 32-bit (x86). Example: X86-based PC

query.script:
' x64-x86.vbs - returns the architecture of the machine
Option Explicit
If Is64() Then WScript.Echo "x64-based PC" Else WScript.Echo "x86-based PC" End If
Function Is64 Dim objWMIService, colItems, objItem Set objWMIService = GetObject("winmgmts:\\.\root\CIMV2") Set colItems = objWMIService.ExecQuery("Select SystemType from Win32_ComputerSystem") For Each objItem In colItems If InStr(LCase(objItem.SystemType), "x64") > 0 Then Is64 = True Else Is64 = False End If Next End Function

sensor.name: WUA Version
sensor.description: The version of the Windows Update Agent on the client machine. Example: 7.6.7600.256

query.script:
'======================================== ' WUA Version '======================================== Option Explicit
WuaVersion() WScript.Quit
Function WuaVersion Dim strOutput, fso, strSysDir, strWuaDll
Set fso = WScript.CreateObject("Scripting.Filesystemobject")
strSysDir = GetSystemDir strWuaDll = strSysDir & "\wuaueng.dll" If fso.FileExists(strWuaDll) Then strOutput = fso.GetFileVersion(strWuaDll) Else strOutput = "WUA DLL ("&strWuaDll&") not found" End If
WScript.Echo strOutput End Function
Function GetSystemDir Dim fso, fsoSys, strWinDir, strSysDir Set fsoSys = WScript.CreateObject("Scripting.Filesystemobject")
'Check for 64-bit sysnative directory to avoid win redirect strWinDir = fsoSys.GetSpecialFolder(0) strSysDir = strWinDir & "\sysnative"
If Not fsoSys.FolderExists(strSysDir) Then strSysDir = fsoSys.GetSpecialFolder(1) End If GetSystemDir = strSysDir End Function

sensor.name: WUA User Access Enabled
sensor.description: Returns Enabled if the user has access to Windows Update Agent configuration settings and Disabled if not. Example: Enabled

query.script:
'======================================== ' WUA User Access Enabled '======================================== Option Explicit
If (checkForWuaAccessDisabled = True) Then WScript.Echo "Disabled" Else WScript.Echo "Enabled" End If WScript.Quit
Function checkForWuaAccessDisabled
Dim strComputer, strKeyPath, strValueName, strValue, reg, result
Const HKLM = &H80000002 strComputer = "."
Set reg = _ GetObject("winmgmts:{impersonationLevel=impersonate}!\\" _ & strComputer & "\root\default:StdRegProv")
strKeyPath = "SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Policies\Explorer" strValueName = "NoWindowsUpdate" strValue = 0 reg.getDWordValue HKLM, strKeyPath, strValueName, strValue If strValue <> 1 Then checkForWuaAccessDisabled = False Exit Function End If
strKeyPath = "SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Policies\Explorer" strValueName = "NoDevMgrUpdate" strValue = 0 reg.getDWordValue HKLM, strKeyPath, strValueName, strValue If strValue <> 1 Then checkForWuaAccessDisabled = False Exit Function End If
strKeyPath = "SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Control Panel\don't load" strValueName = "wuaucpl.cpl" strValue = null reg.getStringValue HKLM, strKeyPath, strValueName, strValue If IsNull(strValue) Then checkForWuaAccessDisabled = False Exit Function End If
checkForWuaAccessDisabled = True
End Function

sensor.name: Service Details
sensor.description: Details about all running services on the client machine, including name, display name, running status, and startup mode. Example: MDM | Machine Debug Manager | Running | Auto

query.script:
'======================================== ' Service Details '========================================
getServiceDetails() WScript.Quit
Function getServiceDetails() 'Check to see if Windows Update Service needs to be enabled and/or stopped at end Dim objWMIService, colComputer, objComputer
Set objWMIService = GetObject("winmgmts:" & "{impersonationLevel=impersonate}!\\.\root\cimv2") Set colServices = objWMIService.ExecQuery ("select DisplayName, State, StartMode from win32_Service")
For Each objService in colServices strServiceName = objService.Name strServiceDisplayName = objService.DisplayName strServiceStatus = objService.State strServiceMode = objService.StartMode WScript.Echo strServiceName & "|" & strServiceDisplayName & "|" & strServiceStatus & "|" & strServiceMode Next
End Function

sensor.name: WUA Settings
sensor.description: The settings for the Windows Update Agent on the client machine. Automatic Install|Every Day 3:00 AM

sensor.name: Out of Date Managed Applications
sensor.description: 3rd party applications that are not up to the latest published version. This multi-column Sensor provides the name of the software, the publisher, the architecture (32-bit or 64-bit), the current version, the latest version, and the status Example: "Adobe Reader | Adobe | 32-bit | 10.1.4 | 10.1.4 | Up to Date

query.script:
'======================================== ' Out of Date Managed Applications '========================================
Option Explicit Dim strSep strSep = "|"
Dim strSearch strSearch = "Out of Date"
Dim strReadablePath strReadablePath = GetTaniumDir("") & "\Tools\Scans\maresultsreadable.txt"
Dim objFso Set objFso = CreateObject("Scripting.FileSystemObject")
If objFso.FileExists(strReadablePath) Then Dim objReadFile Set objReadFile = objFSO.OpenTextFile(strReadablePath, 1, False)
Dim strLine Do While Not objReadFile.AtEndOfStream strLine = objReadFile.ReadLine
If InStr(strLine, strSearch) > 0 Or InStr(strLine, "Error:") Then WScript.Echo strLine End If Loop Else WScript.Echo "Error: managed applications results not found" End If
Function RegKeyExists(reg, sHive, sRegKey) Dim aValueNames, aValueTypes If reg.EnumValues(sHive, sRegKey, aValueNames, aValueTypes) = 0 Then RegKeyExists = True Else RegKeyExists = False End If End Function
Function GetTaniumDir(strSubDir) 'GetTaniumDir with GeneratePath, works in x64 or x32 'looks for a valid Path value
Dim objShell Dim keyNativePath, keyWoWPath, strPath
Set objShell = CreateObject("WScript.Shell")
keyNativePath = "HKLM\Software\Tanium\Tanium Client" keyWoWPath = "HKLM\Software\Wow6432Node\Tanium\Tanium Client"
' first check the Software key (valid for 32-bit machines, or 64-bit machines in 32-bit mode) On Error Resume Next strPath = objShell.RegRead(keyNativePath&"\Path") On Error Goto 0
If strPath = "" Then ' Could not find 32-bit mode path, checking Wow6432Node On Error Resume Next strPath = objShell.RegRead(keyWoWPath&"\Path") On Error Goto 0 End If
If Not strPath = "" Then If strSubDir <> "" Then strSubDir = "\" & strSubDir End If
Dim fso Set fso = WScript.CreateObject("Scripting.Filesystemobject") If fso.FolderExists(strPath) Then If Not fso.FolderExists(strPath & strSubDir) Then ''Need to loop through strSubDir and create all sub directories GeneratePath strPath & strSubDir, fso End If GetTaniumDir = strPath & strSubDir & "\" Else ' Specified Path doesn't exist on the filesystem WScript.Echo "Error: " & strPath & " does not exist on the filesystem" GetTaniumDir = False End If Else WScript.Echo "Error: Cannot find Tanium Client path in Registry" GetTaniumDir = False End If End Function 'GetTaniumDir
Function GeneratePath(pFolderPath, fso) GeneratePath = False
If Not fso.FolderExists(pFolderPath) Then If GeneratePath(fso.GetParentFolderName(pFolderPath), fso) Then GeneratePath = True Call fso.CreateFolder(pFolderPath) End If Else GeneratePath = True End If End Function 'GeneratePath

sensor.name: Up to Date Managed Applications
sensor.description: 3rd party applications that are up to the latest published version. This multi-column Sensor provides the name of the software, the publisher, the architecture (32-bit or 64-bit), the current version, the latest version, and the status Example: "Adobe Reader | Adobe | 32-bit | 10.1.4 | 10.1.4 | Up to Date

query.script:
'======================================== ' Up to Date Managed Applications '======================================== Option Explicit Dim strSep strSep = "|"
Dim strSearch strSearch = "Up to Date"
Dim strReadablePath strReadablePath = GetTaniumDir("") & "\Tools\Scans\maresultsreadable.txt"
Dim objFso Set objFso = CreateObject("Scripting.FileSystemObject")
If objFso.FileExists(strReadablePath) Then Dim objReadFile Set objReadFile = objFSO.OpenTextFile(strReadablePath, 1, False)
Dim strLine Do While Not objReadFile.AtEndOfStream strLine = objReadFile.ReadLine
If InStr(strLine, strSearch) > 0 Or InStr(strLine, "Error:") Then WScript.Echo strLine End If Loop Else WScript.Echo "Error: managed applications results not found" End If
Function RegKeyExists(reg, sHive, sRegKey) Dim aValueNames, aValueTypes If reg.EnumValues(sHive, sRegKey, aValueNames, aValueTypes) = 0 Then RegKeyExists = True Else RegKeyExists = False End If End Function
Function GetTaniumDir(strSubDir) 'GetTaniumDir with GeneratePath, works in x64 or x32 'looks for a valid Path value
Dim objShell Dim keyNativePath, keyWoWPath, strPath
Set objShell = CreateObject("WScript.Shell")
keyNativePath = "HKLM\Software\Tanium\Tanium Client" keyWoWPath = "HKLM\Software\Wow6432Node\Tanium\Tanium Client"
' first check the Software key (valid for 32-bit machines, or 64-bit machines in 32-bit mode) On Error Resume Next strPath = objShell.RegRead(keyNativePath&"\Path") On Error Goto 0
If strPath = "" Then ' Could not find 32-bit mode path, checking Wow6432Node On Error Resume Next strPath = objShell.RegRead(keyWoWPath&"\Path") On Error Goto 0 End If
If Not strPath = "" Then If strSubDir <> "" Then strSubDir = "\" & strSubDir End If
Dim fso Set fso = WScript.CreateObject("Scripting.Filesystemobject") If fso.FolderExists(strPath) Then If Not fso.FolderExists(strPath & strSubDir) Then ''Need to loop through strSubDir and create all sub directories GeneratePath strPath & strSubDir, fso End If GetTaniumDir = strPath & strSubDir & "\" Else ' Specified Path doesn't exist on the filesystem WScript.Echo "Error: " & strPath & " does not exist on the filesystem" GetTaniumDir = False End If Else WScript.Echo "Error: Cannot find Tanium Client path in Registry" GetTaniumDir = False End If End Function 'GetTaniumDir
Function GeneratePath(pFolderPath, fso) GeneratePath = False
If Not fso.FolderExists(pFolderPath) Then If GeneratePath(fso.GetParentFolderName(pFolderPath), fso) Then GeneratePath = True Call fso.CreateFolder(pFolderPath) End If Else GeneratePath = True End If End Function 'GeneratePath

sensor.name: CPU Speed Mhz
sensor.description: The speed of the processor in Mhz. Example: 3200 Mhz

query.script:
'======================================== ' CPU Speed Mhz '========================================
On Error Resume Next
strComputer = "." Set objWMIService = GetObject("winmgmts:" _ & "{impersonationLevel=impersonate}!\\" & strComputer & "\root\cimv2")
Set colItems = objWMIService.ExecQuery("select MaxClockSpeed from win32_processor")
For Each objItem in colItems strSpeed = objItem.MaxClockSpeed intSpeed = CInt(CInt(strSpeed)/10)*10 WScript.Echo intSpeed & " Mhz" Next

sensor.name: High Uptime
sensor.description: Indicates whether the client machine has been online for more than 30 days. Example: Less than 30 days

query.script:
'======================================== ' High Uptime '========================================
strComputer = "." set objWMIDateTime = CreateObject("WbemScripting.SWbemDateTime") set objWMI = GetObject("winmgmts:\\" & strComputer & "\root\cimv2") set colOS = objWMI.InstancesOf("Win32_OperatingSystem")
'Uses date math - set locale
SetLocale(1033)
for each objOS in colOS objWMIDateTime.Value = objOS.LastBootUpTime If TimeSpan(objWMIDateTime.GetVarDate,Now) > 30 Then Wscript.echo TimeSpan(objWMIDateTime.GetVarDate,Now) & " days" Else Wscript.echo "Less than30" End If next Function TimeSpan(dt1, dt2) If (isDate(dt1) And IsDate(dt2)) = false Then TimeSpan = "00:00:00" Exit Function End If seconds = Abs(DateDiff("S", dt1, dt2)) minutes = seconds \ 60 hours = minutes \ 60 days = hours \ 24 minutes = minutes mod 60 seconds = seconds mod 60 TimeSpan = days End Function

sensor.name: High CPU Processes
sensor.parameter_definition: {"parameters":[{"stepSize":1,"maximum":50,"helpString":"Enter the number of processes to return","snapInterval":1,"minimum":1,"defaultValue":"5","value":"5","label":"Number of Processes","key":"numOutput","parameterType":"com.tanium.components.parameters::NumericParameter","model":"com.tanium.components.parameters::NumericParameter"}],"parameterType":"com.tanium.components.parameters::ParametersArray","model":"com.tanium.components.parameters::ParametersArray"}
sensor.description: Lists the specified number of processes that are using the highest amount of CPU. Example: cmd

query.script:
'======================================== ' High CPU Processes '========================================
topNum = Trim(Unescape("||numOutput||")) If Not IsNumeric(topNum) Then WScript.Echo "Parameter Not Number" WScript.Quit End If topNum = Cint(topNum)
printPercent = false Const HKLM = &H80000002 strComputer = "."
Set objWMIService = GetObject("Winmgmts:{impersonationlevel=impersonate}!\Root\Cimv2")
Const MaxCharacters = 255 Const adBSTR = 8 Const adDouble = 5
Set DataList = CreateObject("ADOR.Recordset") DataList.Fields.Append "ProcessName", adBSTR, MaxCharacters DataList.Fields.Append "ProcessCPU1", adDouble DataList.Fields.Append "ProcessCPU2", adDouble DataList.Fields.Append "ProcessCPUDiff", adDouble DataList.Open
Dim total1, total2, totalDiff
Set colProcItems = objWMIService.ExecQuery("Select * from Win32_PerfRawData_PerfProc_Process") For Each objItem in colProcItems If objItem.Name <> "Idle" And objItem.Name <> "_Total" Then DataList.AddNew DataList("ProcessName") = objItem.Name DataList("ProcessCPU1") = objItem.PercentProcessorTime DataList.Update ElseIf objItem.Name = "_Total" Then total1 = CDbl(objItem.PercentProcessorTime) End If Next
sleep = 5 WScript.Sleep(sleep * 1000)
Set colProcItems = objWMIService.ExecQuery("Select * from Win32_PerfRawData_PerfProc_Process") For Each objItem in colProcItems If objItem.Name <> "Idle" And objItem.Name <> "_Total" Then
DataList.MoveFirst DataList.Find("ProcessName = '"& objItem.Name&"'")
If DataList.EOF Then WScript.Echo "** Not Found **" Else DataList("ProcessCPU2") = objItem.PercentProcessorTime DataList("ProcessCPUDiff") = DataList("ProcessCPU2") - DataList("ProcessCPU1") DataList.Update 'WScript.Echo "name: " & DataList.Fields.Item("ProcessName") & ", cpu 1: " & DataList.Fields.Item("ProcessCPU1") & ", cpu 2: " & DataList.Fields.Item("ProcessCPU2") End if ElseIf objItem.Name = "_Total" Then total2 = CDbl(objItem.PercentProcessorTime) totalDiff = total2 - total1 End If Next
DataList.Sort = "ProcessCPUDiff DESC" DataList.MoveFirst i = 1 Do Until DataList.EOF Or i > topNum strPrint = CleanString(DataList.Fields.Item("ProcessName")) If printPercent Then strPrint = strPrint & " (" & Round(DataList.Fields.Item("ProcessCPUDiff") / totalDiff * 100, 0) & "%)" End if WScript.Echo strPrint DataList.MoveNext i = i + 1 Loop
WScript.Quit
'removes .exe and process number at end of Function CleanString(str) words = Split(str, "#") str = words(0) CleanString = str
If Right(str, 4) = ".exe" Then str = Left(str, Len(str) - 4) End If End Function

sensor.name: High Memory Processes
sensor.parameter_definition: {"parameters":[{"stepSize":1,"maximum":50,"helpString":"Enter the number of processes to return","snapInterval":1,"minimum":1,"defaultValue":"5","value":"5","label":"Number of Processes","key":"numOutput","parameterType":"com.tanium.components.parameters::NumericParameter","model":"com.tanium.components.parameters::NumericParameter"}],"parameterType":"com.tanium.components.parameters::ParametersArray","model":"com.tanium.components.parameters::ParametersArray"}
sensor.description: Lists the specified number processes based on ordering on amount of memory used. Example: cmd

query.script:
'======================================== ' High Memory Processes '========================================
topNum = Trim(Unescape("||numOutput||")) If Not IsNumeric(topNum) Then WScript.Echo "Parameter Not Number" WScript.Quit End If topNum = Cint(topNum)
printMemory = false
Dim objWMIService, objItem, colItems, query Dim strComputer, strList
strComputer = "." Set objWMIService = GetObject("winmgmts:{impersonationLevel=impersonate}!\\" & strComputer& "\root\cimv2")
Const MaxCharacters = 255 Const adBSTR = 8 Const adDouble = 5 Set DataList = CreateObject("ADOR.Recordset") DataList.Fields.Append "ProcessName", adBSTR, MaxCharacters DataList.Fields.Append "ProcessMemory", adDouble
DataList.Open
Set colProcs = objWMIService.ExecQuery("Select Name, WorkingSetSize From Win32_Process") For Each proc in colProcs DataList.AddNew DataList("ProcessName") = proc.Name DataList("ProcessMemory") = round(cdbl(proc.WorkingSetSize)/1024/1024, 0) DataList.Update Next DataList.Sort = "ProcessMemory DESC" DataList.MoveFirst i = 1 Do Until DataList.EOF Or i > topNum Set field = DataList.Fields strPrint = CleanString(DataList.Fields.Item("ProcessName")) If printMemory Then strPrint = strPrint & " (" & DataList.Fields.Item("ProcessMemory") & " Mb)" End if WScript.Echo strPrint DataList.MoveNext i = i + 1 Loop
WScript.Quit
'removes .exe and process number at end of process Function CleanString(str) words = Split(str, "#") str = words(0)
If Right(str, 4) = ".exe" Then str = Left(str, Len(str) - 4) End If CleanString = str End Function

sensor.name: Disk Free Space Below Threshold
sensor.description: If a drive has less free space than the configured threshold, the drive and remaining free space is returned. The threshold defaults to 2048 MB and can be altered. Example: C: 1 GB

query.script:
'======================================== ' Disk Free Space Below Threshold '========================================
mbThreshold = 2048
strComputer = "." Set objWMIService = GetObject("winmgmts:" & "{impersonationLevel=impersonate}!\\" & strComputer & "\root\cimv2") Set colDisks = objWMIService.ExecQuery ("Select * from Win32_LogicalDisk where DriveType=3") For Each objDisk in colDisks FreeMB = objDisk.FreeSpace/1024000 if (FreeMB <> "" and FreeMB < mbThreshold and FreeMB <> 0) THEN FreeGB = FreeMB/1024 Wscript.Echo objDisk.DeviceID & " " & Round(FreeGB) & " GB" END IF Next

sensor.name: Stopped Service
sensor.description: Returns a list of all services currently stopped on the client machine. Example: DHCP Client

query.script: select Caption from win32_Service where State='Stopped'
#!/bin/bash first=true launchctl list | while read line do set -- $line if ( $first ); then first=false else if [ "$2" == "0" ]; then echo $3 fi fi done

sensor.name: SQL Database Count
sensor.description: The number of databases in SQL Server on the client machine. Example: 4

query.script:
'======================================== ' SQL Database Count '======================================== '@INCLUDE=sql/mssql_connection_utils.vbs
Option Explicit Dim dictInstances, strInstance, objConnection
Set dictInstances = GetMSSQLInstances()
For Each strInstance In dictInstances.Keys Dim objRecordSet, objRecord, strValue Set objConnection = CreateObject("ADODB.Connection") Set objRecordSet = CreateObject("ADODB.Recordset")
On Error Resume Next objConnection.Open GenMSSQLConnectionStr(strInstance, "master")
If objConnection.Errors.Count > 0 Then WScript.Echo "Access Error (" & strInstance & ")" Exit For End If
On Error Goto 0
objRecordSet.Open "select count(name) as count from master..sysdatabases", objConnection, AD_OPEN_STATIC, AD_LOCK_OPTIMISTIC objRecordSet.MoveFirst For each objRecord in objRecordSet.Properties strValue = objRecordSet("count") WScript.echo strValue & GetMSSQLSensorInstanceStr(strInstance) objRecordSet.MoveNext If (objRecordset.EOF = True) THEN objRecordset.Close Exit For End If Next Next '------------ INCLUDES after this line. Do not edit past this point ----- '- Begin file: sql/mssql_connection_utils.vbs
' Common constants for MSSQL lookups Const AD_OPEN_STATIC = 3 Const AD_LOCK_OPTIMISTIC = 3
Function GetMSSQLInstances() Dim dictResult, objWMIService, colServices, objService Dim strCaption, strInstance, intStartIndex, intStopIndex Set dictResult = CreateObject("Scripting.Dictionary")
Set objWMIService = GetObject("winmgmts:" & "{impersonationLevel=impersonate}!\\.\root\cimv2") Set colServices = objWMIService.ExecQuery ("select * from win32_Service") For Each objService In colServices strCaption = objService.Caption
If (InStr(strCaption,"SQL Server") <> 0 And ObjService.State = "Running") Then ' OK -- found SQL Server on this machien, now we need to find the instance name ' if this is the correct service strInstance = "." intStartIndex = InStr(strCaption, "(") intStopIndex = InStr(strCaption, ")")
If(intStartIndex <> 0) And (intStopIndex <> 0) Then strInstance = Mid(strCaption, intStartIndex + 1, intStopIndex - intStartIndex - 1)
If strInstance = "MSSQLSERVER" Then strInstance = "." End If
If Not dictResult.Exists(strInstance) Then dictResult.Add strInstance, True End if End If End If Next
Set GetMSSQLInstances = dictResult
End Function ' GetMSSQLInstances
Function GenMSSQLConnectionStr(strInstance, strCatalog) Dim strDataSource, strConnection
If strInstance = "." Then strDataSource = strInstance Else strDataSource = ".\" & strInstance End If
strConnection = "Provider=SQLOLEDB;Data Source=" & strDataSource & ";Trusted_Connection=Yes;Initial Catalog=" & strCatalog & ";"
GenMSSQLConnectionStr = strConnection End Function ' OpenMSSQLConnection
Function GetMSSQLSensorInstanceStr(strInstance) If strInstance = "." Then GetMSSQLSensorInstanceStr = "" Else GetMSSQLSensorInstanceStr = " (" & strInstance & ")" End If End Function ' GetMSSQLSensorInstanceStr '- End file: sql/mssql_connection_utils.vbs

sensor.name: SQL Server Edition
sensor.description: Returns the Edition of SQL Server installed on the client machine if it exists. Example: Enterprise Edition (64-bit)

query.script:
'======================================== ' SQL Server Edition '======================================== Option Explicit
Const MAX_SQL_NUMBER = 15 Const DEBUG_OUT = False Dim strValueName, strSKUName, strEdition, strVersion, strArchitecture Dim objWMI, dictWMIs, objProp, strOut, dictServices
Set dictWMIs = CreateObject("Scripting.Dictionary") Set dictServices = CreateObject("Scripting.Dictionary")
BuildSQLCompMgmtWMIsDict(dictWMIs)
PrintProp "SKUNAME"
Function IsMultiple(ByRef dictWMIs)
If dictWMIs.Count > 1 Then IsMultiple = True Else IsMultiple = False End If
End Function 'IsMultiple
Sub PrintProp(strProp) Dim intOutCount intOutCount = 1 If dictWMIs.Count = 0 Then WScript.Echo "SQL Not Found" Else For Each objWMI In dictWMIs.Keys strOut = GetSQLServiceAdvancedProp(strProp,objWMI) If Len(strOut) > 0 Then intOutCount = intOutCount + 1 WScript.Echo strOut Else WScript.Echo "SQL Not Found" DebugPrint "SQL Property Not Found" End If Next End If
End Sub 'PrintProp
Function PrintServices BuildSQLServicesNames objWMI,dictServices ' Print Services Dim strService For Each strService In dictServices.Keys WScript.Echo strService Next End Function 'PrintServices
Function GetBitnessFromSKU(strSKUName) ' Returns appropriate bitness from SKU value Dim strArchitecture If Instr(strSKUName, " (") <> 0 Then strArchitecture = "64-bit" Else strArchitecture = "32-bit" End If GetBitnessFromSKU = strArchitecture
End Function 'GetBitnessFromSKU
Function GetCleanEdition(strSKUName) ' Removes bitness from SKU value Dim strEdition If Instr(strSKUName, " (") <> 0 Then strEdition = Left(strSKUName, Instr(strSKUName, " (")) Else strEdition = strSKUName End If
GetCleanEdition = strEdition
End Function 'CleanSKU
Function GetSQLServiceAdvancedProp(strProp,ByRef objWMI) ' Property Names may change for different SQL versions 'SQLSTATES,VERSION,SPLEVEL,CLUSTERED,INSTALLPATH,DATAPATH,LANGUAGE,FILEVERSION, 'VSNAME,REGROOT,SKU,SKUNAME,INSTANCEID,STARTUPPARAMETERS,ERRORREPORTING,DUMPDIR, 'SQMREPORTING,ISWOW64 On Error Resume Next Dim strOut, intType, strPropVal, colResults strProp = UCase(strProp) ' text matches will happen when uppercased Set colResults = objWMI.ExecQuery("select * from SqlServiceAdvancedProperty where SQLServiceType = 1") For Each objProp In colResults If objProp.PropertyName = strProp Then intType = objProp.PropertyValueType If Err.Number <> 0 Then DebugPrint Err.Description & " inttype is " & objProp.PropertyValueType Err.Clear End If If intType = 0 Then strOut = objProp.PropertyStrValue If Err.Number <> 0 Then DebugPrint Err.Description & " strout is " & objProp.PropertyStrValue Err.Clear End If Else strOut = objProp.PropertyNumValue End If End If Next
Err.Clear On Error Goto 0 GetSQLServiceAdvancedProp = strOut
If DEBUG_OUT = True Then WScript.Echo "Debug, listing all props " On Error Resume Next For Each objProp In colResults intType = objProp.PropertyValueType
If intType = 0 Then strOut = objProp.PropertyStrValue Else strOut = objProp.PropertyNumValue End If WScript.Echo "Property name: "&objProp.PropertyName&", valuetype: "&intType&", value: "&strOut Next End If End Function 'GetSQLServiceAdvancedProp
Sub BuildSQLServicesNames(ByRef objWMI,ByRef dictServices)
Dim strService
For Each objProp In objWMI.ExecQuery("select * from SqlServiceAdvancedProperty where SQLServiceType = 1") strService = objProp.ServiceName If Not IsNull(strService) Then If Not dictServices.Exists(strService) Then dictServices.Add strService,1 End If End If Next
End Sub 'BuildSQLServicesNames
Sub DebugPrint(ByRef strToPrint)
If DEBUG_OUT Then WScript.Echo strToPrint End If End Sub 'DebugPrint
Sub BuildSQLCompMgmtWMIsDict(ByRef dictWMIs)
' Define a constant MAX_SQL_NUMBER in global scope Dim objWMI,i,strWMINameSpace On Error Resume Next
' First try 2005 strWMINameSpace = "WINMGMTS:\\.\root\Microsoft\SqlServer\ComputerManagement" Set objWMI = GetObject(strWMINameSpace) If Err.Number = 0 Then dictWMIs.Add objWMI,strWMINameSpace DebugPrint strWMINameSpace Else Err.Clear ' Loop through 2008 to 2012 and beyond For i = 10 To MAX_SQL_NUMBER strWMINameSpace = "WINMGMTS:\\.\root\Microsoft\SqlServer\ComputerManagement"&CStr(i) Set objWMI = GetObject(strWMINameSpace) If Err.Number = 0 Then dictWMIs.Add objWMI,strWMINameSpace DebugPrint strWMINameSpace Else Err.Clear End If Next End If
Err.Clear On Error Goto 0 If dictWMIs.Count = 0 Then WScript.Echo "SQL Not Found" WScript.Quit End If
End Sub 'BuildSQLCompMgmtWMIsDict

'======================================== ' SQL Buffer Hit Ratio '======================================== '@INCLUDE=sql/mssql_connection_utils.vbs
Option Explicit
Dim dictInstances, strInstance, objConnection
Set dictInstances = GetMSSQLInstances()
For Each strInstance In dictInstances.Keys Dim objRecordSet, objRecordSet2, objConnection2, Record, strDatabase, strDBSize Set objConnection = CreateObject("ADODB.Connection") Set objRecordSet = CreateObject("ADODB.Recordset") Set objConnection2 = CreateObject("ADODB.Connection") Set objRecordSet2 = CreateObject("ADODB.Recordset")
On Error Resume Next objConnection.Open GenMSSQLConnectionStr(strInstance, "master")
If objConnection.Errors.Count > 0 Then WScript.Echo "Access Error (" & strInstance & ")" Exit For End If
On Error Goto 0
objRecordSet.Open "SELECT name FROM sys.databases", objConnection, AD_OPEN_STATIC, AD_LOCK_OPTIMISTIC
For Each Record In objRecordSet.Properties strDatabase = objRecordSet("name") objConnection2.Open GenMSSQLConnectionStr(strInstance, strDatabase)
If objConnection2.Errors.Count > 0 Then WScript.Echo "Access Error (" & strInstance & ")" Exit For End If
On Error Goto 0
objRecordSet2.Open "Select cast(size * 8/1024.0 as decimal(18,2)) SpaceUsed_MB From SYS.database_files where type_desc = 'ROWS'", objConnection2, AD_OPEN_STATIC, AD_LOCK_OPTIMISTIC strDBSize = objRecordSet2("SpaceUsed_MB") WScript.echo strDatabase & " " & strDBSize & "MB" & GetMSSQLSensorInstanceStr(strInstance) objRecordset2.Close objConnection2.Close ObjRecordSet.MoveNext If (ObjRecordset.EOF = True) Then objRecordset.Close Exit For End If Next Next '------------ INCLUDES after this line. Do not edit past this point ----- '- Begin file: sql/mssql_connection_utils.vbs
' Common constants for MSSQL lookups Const AD_OPEN_STATIC = 3 Const AD_LOCK_OPTIMISTIC = 3
Function GetMSSQLInstances() Dim dictResult, objWMIService, colServices, objService Dim strCaption, strInstance, intStartIndex, intStopIndex Set dictResult = CreateObject("Scripting.Dictionary")
Set objWMIService = GetObject("winmgmts:" & "{impersonationLevel=impersonate}!\\.\root\cimv2") Set colServices = objWMIService.ExecQuery ("select * from win32_Service") For Each objService In colServices strCaption = objService.Caption
If (InStr(strCaption,"SQL Server") <> 0 And ObjService.State = "Running") Then ' OK -- found SQL Server on this machien, now we need to find the instance name ' if this is the correct service strInstance = "." intStartIndex = InStr(strCaption, "(") intStopIndex = InStr(strCaption, ")")
If(intStartIndex <> 0) And (intStopIndex <> 0) Then strInstance = Mid(strCaption, intStartIndex + 1, intStopIndex - intStartIndex - 1)
If strInstance = "MSSQLSERVER" Then strInstance = "." End If
If Not dictResult.Exists(strInstance) Then dictResult.Add strInstance, True End if End If End If Next
Set GetMSSQLInstances = dictResult
End Function ' GetMSSQLInstances
Function GenMSSQLConnectionStr(strInstance, strCatalog) Dim strDataSource, strConnection
If strInstance = "." Then strDataSource = strInstance Else strDataSource = ".\" & strInstance End If
strConnection = "Provider=SQLOLEDB;Data Source=" & strDataSource & ";Trusted_Connection=Yes;Initial Catalog=" & strCatalog & ";"
GenMSSQLConnectionStr = strConnection End Function ' OpenMSSQLConnection
Function GetMSSQLSensorInstanceStr(strInstance) If strInstance = "." Then GetMSSQLSensorInstanceStr = "" Else GetMSSQLSensorInstanceStr = " (" & strInstance & ")" End If End Function ' GetMSSQLSensorInstanceStr '- End file: sql/mssql_connection_utils.vbs

'======================================== ' SQL Database Recovery Mode '======================================== '@INCLUDE=sql/mssql_connection_utils.vbs
Option Explicit Dim dictInstances, strInstance, objConnection
Set dictInstances = GetMSSQLInstances()
For Each strInstance In dictInstances.Keys Dim objRecordSet, objRecordSet2, Record, strDatabase, strDBRecovery
Set objConnection = CreateObject("ADODB.Connection") Set objRecordSet = CreateObject("ADODB.Recordset") Set objRecordSet2 = CreateObject("ADODB.Recordset") On Error Resume Next objConnection.Open GenMSSQLConnectionStr(strInstance, "master")
If objConnection.Errors.Count > 0 Then WScript.Echo "Access Error (" & strInstance & ")" Exit For End If
On Error Goto 0
objRecordSet.Open "SELECT name FROM sys.databases", objConnection, AD_OPEN_STATIC, AD_LOCK_OPTIMISTIC For Each Record In objRecordSet.Properties strDatabase = objRecordSet("name") objRecordSet2.Open "select databasepropertyex([name],'Recovery') as [Recovery] from dbo.sysdatabases where name=" & "'" & strDatabase & "'", _ objConnection, AD_OPEN_STATIC, AD_LOCK_OPTIMISTIC strDBRecovery = objRecordSet2("Recovery") WScript.echo strDatabase & " " & strDBRecovery & GetMSSQLSensorInstanceStr(strInstance) objRecordset2.Close ObjRecordSet.MoveNext If (ObjRecordset.EOF = True) Then objRecordset.Close Exit For End If Next Next '------------ INCLUDES after this line. Do not edit past this point ----- '- Begin file: sql/mssql_connection_utils.vbs
' Common constants for MSSQL lookups Const AD_OPEN_STATIC = 3 Const AD_LOCK_OPTIMISTIC = 3
Function GetMSSQLInstances() Dim dictResult, objWMIService, colServices, objService Dim strCaption, strInstance, intStartIndex, intStopIndex Set dictResult = CreateObject("Scripting.Dictionary")
Set objWMIService = GetObject("winmgmts:" & "{impersonationLevel=impersonate}!\\.\root\cimv2") Set colServices = objWMIService.ExecQuery ("select * from win32_Service") For Each objService In colServices strCaption = objService.Caption
If (InStr(strCaption,"SQL Server") <> 0 And ObjService.State = "Running") Then ' OK -- found SQL Server on this machien, now we need to find the instance name ' if this is the correct service strInstance = "." intStartIndex = InStr(strCaption, "(") intStopIndex = InStr(strCaption, ")")
If(intStartIndex <> 0) And (intStopIndex <> 0) Then strInstance = Mid(strCaption, intStartIndex + 1, intStopIndex - intStartIndex - 1)
If strInstance = "MSSQLSERVER" Then strInstance = "." End If
If Not dictResult.Exists(strInstance) Then dictResult.Add strInstance, True End if End If End If Next
Set GetMSSQLInstances = dictResult
End Function ' GetMSSQLInstances
Function GenMSSQLConnectionStr(strInstance, strCatalog) Dim strDataSource, strConnection
If strInstance = "." Then strDataSource = strInstance Else strDataSource = ".\" & strInstance End If
strConnection = "Provider=SQLOLEDB;Data Source=" & strDataSource & ";Trusted_Connection=Yes;Initial Catalog=" & strCatalog & ";"
GenMSSQLConnectionStr = strConnection End Function ' OpenMSSQLConnection
Function GetMSSQLSensorInstanceStr(strInstance) If strInstance = "." Then GetMSSQLSensorInstanceStr = "" Else GetMSSQLSensorInstanceStr = " (" & strInstance & ")" End If End Function ' GetMSSQLSensorInstanceStr '- End file: sql/mssql_connection_utils.vbs

sensor.name: Application Crashes Yesterday
sensor.description: A multi-column Sensor that shows processes that have crashed yesterday, including the instance number to capture multiple crashes by the same process. Example: firefox.exe | 3

query.script:
'======================================== ' Application Crashes Yesterday '======================================== '@INCLUDE=utils/SensorRandomization/SensorRandomizationFunctions.vbs Option Explicit
SensorRandomize()
Dim strSep Dim objWMIService, colEvents, objEvent, intCount Dim dtmStart, dtmEnd
strSep = "|" intCount = 0
dtmStart = GetYesterdayStart dtmEnd = GetYesterdayEnd
'Dictionary object used to track duplicate processes Dim oDic Set oDic = CreateObject("scripting.dictionary")
Set objWMIService = GetObject("winmgmts:" _ & "{impersonationLevel=impersonate,authenticationLevel=Pkt,(Security)}!\\.\root\cimv2")
Set colEvents = objWMIService.ExecQuery _ ("SELECT * FROM Win32_NTLogEvent WHERE Message like 'Faulting application %' AND Logfile = 'Application' AND " _ & "TimeWritten >= '" & dtmStart & "' AND " _ & "TimeWritten < '" & dtmEnd & "' AND " _ & "(EventCode = '1000')")
For Each objEvent In colEvents Dim strMessage, arrLines, strLine, strApp, strModule, strTime
strMessage = objEvent.Message arrLines = Split(strMessage, vbCrLf)
Dim strIndex, strIndexXp
'just go through first line of log to grab app name strLine = arrLines(0)
'strIndex is for new OSes, strIndexXP for older... strIndex = "Faulting application name: " strIndexXp = "Faulting application " If Left(strLine, Len(strIndex)) = strIndex Then strApp = Mid(strLine, Len(strIndex) + 1, InStr(strLine, ",") - Len(strIndex) - 1) ElseIf Left(strLine, Len(strIndexXp)) = strIndexXp Then strApp = Mid(strLine, Len(strIndexXp) + 1, InStr(strLine, ",") - Len(strIndexXp) - 1) End If
Dim intInstance If oDic.Exists(strApp) Then oDic.Item(strApp) = oDic.Item(strApp) + 1 intInstance = oDic.Item(strApp) Else oDic.Item(strApp) = 1 intInstance = 1 End If
strTime = DatetimeToDate(objEvent.TimeWritten)
WScript.Echo strApp & strSep & intInstance intCount = intCount + 1 '& strSep & strTime '& strSep & dtmStart & strSep & objEvent.TimeWritten & strSep & dtmEnd Next
If intCount = 0 Then WScript.Echo "No Application Crashes Found" & strSep End if
Function GetYesterdayStart Dim dtmYesterday dtmYesterday = Date() - 1 ' WScript.Echo dtmYesterday
Dim dateTime Set dateTime = CreateObject("WbemScripting.SWbemDateTime") dateTime.SetVarDate dtmYesterday, False
GetYesterdayStart = dateTime End Function
Function GetYesterdayEnd Dim dtmYesterday dtmYesterday = Date() ' WScript.Echo dtmYesterday
Dim dateTime Set dateTime = CreateObject("WbemScripting.SWbemDateTime") dateTime.SetVarDate dtmYesterday, False
GetYesterdayEnd = dateTime End Function
Function DatetimeToDate(strDate) DatetimeToDate = _ CDate(Mid(strDate, 5, 2) & _ "/" & _ Mid(strDate, 7, 2) & _ "/" & _ Left(strDate, 4) & _ " " & _ Mid (strDate, 9, 2) & _ ":" & _ Mid(strDate, 11, 2) & _ ":" & _ Mid(strDate, 13, 2)) End Function
Function GetTimeWrittenByDaysOld(days) 'subtract "days" days worth of seconds
Dim epoc, monthAgo epoc = date2epoch(Now()) - days*24*60*60 monthAgo = epoch2date(epoc)
Dim dateTime Set dateTime = CreateObject("WbemScripting.SWbemDateTime") dateTime.SetVarDate monthAgo, True
GetTimeWrittenByDaysOld = dateTime End Function
function date2epoch(myDate) date2epoch = DateDiff("s", "01/01/1970 00:00:00", myDate) end Function
function epoch2date(myEpoch) epoch2date = DateAdd("s", myEpoch, "01/01/1970 00:00:00") end Function '------------ INCLUDES after this line. Do not edit past this point ----- '- Begin file: utils/SensorRandomization/SensorRandomizationFunctions.vbs '' -- Begin Random Sleep Functions -- ''
Dim bSensorRandomizeDebugOutput : bSensorRandomizeDebugOutput = False
Function SensorRandomizeLow() Dim intSensorRandomizeWaitLow : intSensorRandomizeWaitLow = 10 SensorRandomizeRandomSleep(intSensorRandomizeWaitLow) End Function ' SensorRandomizeLow
Function SensorRandomize() Dim intSensorRandomizeWaitMed : intSensorRandomizeWaitMed = 20 SensorRandomizeRandomSleep(intSensorRandomizeWaitMed) End Function ' SensorRandomize
Function SensorRandomizeHigh() Dim intSensorRandomizeWaitHigh : intSensorRandomizeWaitHigh = 30 SensorRandomizeRandomSleep(intSensorRandomizeWaitHigh) End Function ' SensorRandomize
Function SensorRandomizeRandomSleep(intSleepTime) ' sleeps for a random period of time, intSleepTime is in seconds ' if the sensor randomize flag is on ' RandomizeScalingFactor is a multiplier on the values hardcoded in the sensor ' not typically set but can adjust timings per endpoint, optionally Dim intSensorRandomizeWaitTime Dim objShell,intRandomizeFlag,strRandomizeRegPath,intRandomizeScalingPercentage strRandomizeRegPath = SensorRandomizeGetTaniumRegistryPath&"\Sensor Data\Random Sleep"
Set objShell = CreateObject("WScript.Shell") On Error Resume Next intRandomizeFlag = objShell.RegRead("HKLM\"&strRandomizeRegPath&"\SensorRandomizeFlag") intRandomizeScalingPercentage = objShell.RegRead("HKLM\"&strRandomizeRegPath&"\SensorRandomizeScalingPercentage") On Error Goto 0 If intRandomizeFlag > 0 Then If intRandomizeScalingPercentage > 0 Then intSleepTime = intRandomizeScalingPercentage * .01 * intSleepTime SensorRandomizeEcho "Randomize scaling percentage of " _ & intRandomizeScalingPercentage & " applied, new sleep time is " & intSleepTime End If intSensorRandomizeWaitTime = CLng(intSleepTime) * 1000 ' convert to milliseconds ' wait random interval between 0 and the max Randomize(SensorRandomizeTaniumRandomSeed) ' assign random value to wait time max value intSensorRandomizeWaitTime = Int( ( intSensorRandomizeWaitTime + 1 ) * Rnd ) SensorRandomizeEcho "Sleeping for " & intSensorRandomizeWaitTime & " milliseconds" WScript.Sleep(intSensorRandomizeWaitTime) SensorRandomizeEcho "Done sleeping, continuing ..." Else SensorRandomizeEcho "SensorRandomize Not Enabled - No Op" End If End Function 'SensorRandomizeRandomSleep
Function SensorRandomizeTaniumRandomSeed ' for randomizing sensor code, the default seed is not random enough Dim timerNum timerNum = Timer() If timerNum < 1 Then SensorRandomizeTaniumRandomSeed = (SensorRandomizeGetTaniumComputerID / Timer() * 10 ) Else SensorRandomizeTaniumRandomSeed = SensorRandomizeGetTaniumComputerID / Timer End If End Function 'SensorRandomizeTaniumRandomSeed
Function SensorRandomizeGetTaniumRegistryPath 'SensorRandomizeGetTaniumRegistryPath works in x64 or x32 'looks for a valid Path value
Dim objShell Dim keyNativePath, keyWoWPath, strPath, strFoundTaniumRegistryPath
Set objShell = CreateObject("WScript.Shell")
keyNativePath = "Software\Tanium\Tanium Client" keyWoWPath = "Software\Wow6432Node\Tanium\Tanium Client"
' first check the Software key (valid for 32-bit machines, or 64-bit machines in 32-bit mode) On Error Resume Next strPath = objShell.RegRead("HKLM\"&keyNativePath&"\Path") On Error Goto 0 strFoundTaniumRegistryPath = keyNativePath
If strPath = "" Then ' Could not find 32-bit mode path, checking Wow6432Node On Error Resume Next strPath = objShell.RegRead("HKLM\"&keyWoWPath&"\Path") On Error Goto 0 strFoundTaniumRegistryPath = keyWoWPath End If
If Not strPath = "" Then SensorRandomizeGetTaniumRegistryPath = strFoundTaniumRegistryPath Else SensorRandomizeGetTaniumRegistryPath = False WScript.Echo "Error: Cannot locate Tanium Registry Path" End If End Function 'SensorRandomizeGetTaniumRegistryPath
Function SensorRandomizeGetTaniumComputerID '' This function gets the Tanium Computer ID Dim objShell Dim intClientID,strID,strKeyPath,strValueName
strKeyPath = SensorRandomizeGetTaniumRegistryPath strValueName = "ComputerID" Set objShell = CreateObject("WScript.Shell") On Error Resume Next intClientID = objShell.RegRead("HKLM\"&strKeyPath&"\"&strValueName) If Err.Number <> 0 Then SensorRandomizeGetTaniumComputerID = 0 Else SensorRandomizeGetTaniumComputerID = SensorRandomizeReinterpretSignedAsUnsigned(intClientID) End If On Error Goto 0 End Function 'SensorRandomizeGetTaniumComputerID
Function SensorRandomizeReinterpretSignedAsUnsigned(ByVal x) If x < 0 Then x = x + 2^32 SensorRandomizeReinterpretSignedAsUnsigned = x End Function 'SensorRandomizeReinterpretSignedAsUnsigned
Sub SensorRandomizeEcho(str) If bSensorRandomizeDebugOutput = true Then WScript.Echo str End Sub 'SensorRandomizeEcho ' -- End Random Sleep Functions --' '- End file: utils/SensorRandomization/SensorRandomizationFunctions.vbs

sensor.name: Last System Crash
sensor.description: Returns the date of the last system crash that occurred. Example: 8/2/2012

query.script:
'======================================== ' Last System Crash '========================================
Dim strValueName, strKey
strValueName = "DumpFile" strDumpsDirName = "MinidumpDir"
'Uses date math - set locale
SetLocale(GetTaniumLocale)
strKey = "SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Control\CrashControl"
Set objReg=GetObject("winmgmts:{impersonationLevel=impersonate}!\\.\root\default:StdRegProv") Const HKLM = &h80000002
Dim fso Set fso = WScript.CreateObject("Scripting.Filesystemobject")
'Get main dump file Dim mainDumpDate If RegKeyExists(objReg, HKLM, strKey) Then objReg.GetExpandedStringValue HKLM, strKey, strValueName, strValue
If fso.FileExists(strValue) Then
Set objFile = fso.GetFile(strValue) mainDumpDate = objfile.DateLastModified End If Else WScript.Echo "Error, Dump key not found: HKLM\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Control\CrashControl" End If
'Examine minidump folder Dim newestMini
If RegKeyExists(objReg, HKLM, strKey) Then objReg.GetExpandedStringValue HKLM, strKey, strDumpsDirName, strDumpDir
If fso.FolderExists(strDumpDir) Then Set oFolder = fso.GetFolder(strDumpDir) For Each sFile In oFolder.Files If Right(LCase(sFile.Name), 4) = ".dmp" Then If newestMini = "" Then Set newestMini = sFile Else If newestMini.DateLastModified < sFile.DateLastModified Then Set newestMini = sFile End If End If End If Next End If End If
If newestMini = "" And mainDumpDate = "" Then WScript.Echo "No system crashes found" WScript.Quit End If
Dim responseDate If newestMini = "" Then responseDate = mainDumpDate ElseIf mainDumpDate = "" Then responseDate = newestMini.DateLastModified Else If newestMini.DateLastModified < mainDumpDate Then responseDate = mainDumpDate Else responseDate = newestMini.DateLastModified End If End If
Dim arrTemp arrTemp = Split(responseDate) responseDate = arrTemp(0)
WScript.Echo responseDate
Function RegKeyExists(objRegistry, sHive, sRegKey) Dim aValueNames, aValueTypes If objRegistry.EnumValues(sHive, sRegKey, aValueNames, aValueTypes) = 0 Then RegKeyExists = True Else RegKeyExists = False End If End Function
Function GetTaniumLocale '' This function will retrieve the locale value ' previously set which governs Tanium content that ' is locale sensitive.
Dim objWshShell Dim intLocaleID
Set objWshShell = CreateObject("WScript.Shell") On Error Resume Next intLocaleID = objWshShell.RegRead("HKLM\Software\Tanium\Tanium Client\LocaleID") If Err.Number <> 0 Then intLocaleID = objWshShell.RegRead("HKLM\Software\Wow6432Node\Tanium\Tanium Client\LocaleID") End If On Error Goto 0 If intLocaleID = "" Then GetTaniumLocale = 1033 ' default to us/English Else GetTaniumLocale = intLocaleID End If
' Cleanup Set objWshShell = Nothing
End Function 'GetTaniumLocale

sensor.name: Last System Crash in X Days
sensor.parameter_definition: {"parameters":[{"stepSize":1,"maximum":365,"helpString":"Enter the number of days to query and return system crashes","snapInterval":1,"minimum":1,"defaultValue":"5","value":"5","label":"Number of Days","key":"dayThresh","parameterType":"com.tanium.components.parameters::NumericParameter","model":"com.tanium.components.parameters::NumericParameter"}],"parameterType":"com.tanium.components.parameters::ParametersArray","model":"com.tanium.components.parameters::ParametersArray"}
sensor.description: Returns the date at which the last system crash occurred. Example:5/2/2012

query.script:
'======================================== ' Last System Crash in X Days '========================================
dayThresh = LCase(Trim(Unescape("||dayThresh||"))) 'dayThresh = LCase(Trim(Unescape("1"))) If Not IsNumeric(dayThresh) Then WScript.Echo "Parameter Not Number" WScript.Quit End If dayThresh = Cint(dayThresh)
Dim strValueName, strKey
strValueName = "DumpFile" strDumpsDirName = "MinidumpDir"
strKey = "SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Control\CrashControl"
Set objReg=GetObject("winmgmts:{impersonationLevel=impersonate}!\\.\root\default:StdRegProv") Const HKLM = &h80000002
'Uses date math - set locale
SetLocale(GetTaniumLocale)
Dim fso Set fso = WScript.CreateObject("Scripting.Filesystemobject")
'Get main dump file Dim mainDumpDate If RegKeyExists(objReg, HKLM, strKey) Then objReg.GetExpandedStringValue HKLM, strKey, strValueName, strValue
If fso.FileExists(strValue) Then
Set objFile = fso.GetFile(strValue) mainDumpDate = objfile.DateLastModified End If Else WScript.Echo "Error, Dump key not found: HKLM\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Control\CrashControl" End If
'Examine minidump folder Dim newestMini
If RegKeyExists(objReg, HKLM, strKey) Then objReg.GetExpandedStringValue HKLM, strKey, strDumpsDirName, strDumpDir
If fso.FolderExists(strDumpDir) Then Set oFolder = fso.GetFolder(strDumpDir) For Each sFile In oFolder.Files If newestMini = "" Then Set newestMini = sFile Else If newestMini.DateLastModified < sFile.DateLastModified Then Set newestMini = sFile End If End If Next End If End If
If newestMini = "" And mainDumpDate = "" Then WScript.Echo "No system crashes found" WScript.Quit End If
Dim responseDate If newestMini = "" Then responseDate = mainDumpDate ElseIf mainDumpDate = "" Then responseDate = newestMini.DateLastModified Else If newestMini.DateLastModified < mainDumpDate Then responseDate = mainDumpDate Else responseDate = newestMini.DateLastModified End If End If
current = Now() dayDiff = DateDiff("d", responseDate, current)
Dim arrTemp If dayDiff <= dayThresh Then arrTemp = Split(responseDate) responseDate = arrTemp(0)
WScript.Echo responseDate Else WScript.Echo "No system crashes in day range" End If
Function RegKeyExists(objRegistry, sHive, sRegKey) Dim aValueNames, aValueTypes If objRegistry.EnumValues(sHive, sRegKey, aValueNames, aValueTypes) = 0 Then RegKeyExists = True Else RegKeyExists = False End If End Function
Function GetTaniumLocale '' This function will retrieve the locale value ' previously set which governs Tanium content that ' is locale sensitive.
Dim objWshShell Dim intLocaleID
Set objWshShell = CreateObject("WScript.Shell") On Error Resume Next intLocaleID = objWshShell.RegRead("HKLM\Software\Tanium\Tanium Client\LocaleID") If Err.Number <> 0 Then intLocaleID = objWshShell.RegRead("HKLM\Software\Wow6432Node\Tanium\Tanium Client\LocaleID") End If On Error Goto 0 If intLocaleID = "" Then GetTaniumLocale = 1033 ' default to us/English Else GetTaniumLocale = intLocaleID End If
' Cleanup Set objWshShell = Nothing
End Function 'GetTaniumLocale

sensor.name: Application Crashes in Last X Days
sensor.parameter_definition: {"parameters":[{"stepSize":1,"maximum":365,"helpString":"Enter the number of days to query for Application Crashes","snapInterval":1,"minimum":1,"defaultValue":"5","value":"5","label":"Number of Days","key":"days","parameterType":"com.tanium.components.parameters::NumericParameter","model":"com.tanium.components.parameters::NumericParameter"}],"parameterType":"com.tanium.components.parameters::ParametersArray","model":"com.tanium.components.parameters::ParametersArray"}
sensor.description: A parameterized Sensor that queries for any processes that have crashed in the last X days. Example: chrome.exe

query.script:
'======================================== ' Application Crashes in Last X Days '======================================== '@INCLUDE=utils/SensorRandomization/SensorRandomizationFunctions.vbs Option Explicit Dim strSep Dim objWMIService, colEvents, objEvent, intCount Dim dtmStart
strSep = "|" intCount = 0
'Uses date math - set locale
SetLocale(1033)
dtmStart = GetTimeWrittenByDaysOld(||days||) 'dtmStart = GetTimeWrittenByDaysOld(7)
Set objWMIService = GetObject("winmgmts:" _ & "{impersonationLevel=impersonate,authenticationLevel=Pkt,(Security)}!\\.\root\cimv2")
Set colEvents = objWMIService.ExecQuery _ ("SELECT * FROM Win32_NTLogEvent WHERE Message like 'Faulting application %' AND Logfile = 'Application' AND " _ & "TimeWritten >= '" & dtmStart & "' AND " _ & "(EventCode = '1000')")
For Each objEvent In colEvents Dim strMessage, arrLines, strLine, strApp, strModule, strTime
strMessage = objEvent.Message arrLines = Split(strMessage, vbCrLf)
Dim strIndex, strIndexXp
'just go through first line of log to grab app name strLine = arrLines(0)
'strIndex is for new OSes, strIndexXP for older... strIndex = "Faulting application name: " strIndexXp = "Faulting application " If Left(strLine, Len(strIndex)) = strIndex Then strApp = Mid(strLine, Len(strIndex) + 1, InStr(strLine, ",") - Len(strIndex) - 1) ElseIf Left(strLine, Len(strIndexXp)) = strIndexXp Then strApp = Mid(strLine, Len(strIndexXp) + 1, InStr(strLine, ",") - Len(strIndexXp) - 1) End If
strTime = DatetimeToDate(objEvent.TimeWritten)
Dim strDate, arrTemp arrTemp = Split(strTime) strDate = arrTemp(0) WScript.Echo strApp & strSep & strDate intCount = intCount + 1 Next
If intCount = 0 Then WScript.Echo "No Application Crashes Found" & strSep End if
Function DatetimeToDate(strDate) DatetimeToDate = _ CDate(Mid(strDate, 5, 2) & _ "/" & _ Mid(strDate, 7, 2) & _ "/" & _ Left(strDate, 4) & _ " " & _ Mid (strDate, 9, 2) & _ ":" & _ Mid(strDate, 11, 2) & _ ":" & _ Mid(strDate, 13, 2)) End Function
Function GetTimeWrittenByDaysOld(days) 'subtract "days" days worth of seconds
Dim epoc, monthAgo epoc = date2epoch(Now()) - days*24*60*60 monthAgo = epoch2date(epoc)
Dim dateTime Set dateTime = CreateObject("WbemScripting.SWbemDateTime") dateTime.SetVarDate monthAgo, True
GetTimeWrittenByDaysOld = dateTime End Function
function date2epoch(myDate) date2epoch = DateDiff("s", "01/01/1970 00:00:00", myDate) end Function
function epoch2date(myEpoch) epoch2date = DateAdd("s", myEpoch, "01/01/1970 00:00:00") end Function '------------ INCLUDES after this line. Do not edit past this point ----- '- Begin file: utils/SensorRandomization/SensorRandomizationFunctions.vbs '' -- Begin Random Sleep Functions -- ''

Function SensorRandomizeHigh() Dim intSensorRandomizeWaitHigh : intSensorRandomizeWaitHigh = 30 SensorRandomizeRandomSleep(intSensorRandomizeWaitHigh) End Function ' SensorRandomize

Set objShell = CreateObject("WScript.Shell") On Error Resume Next intRandomizeFlag = objShell.RegRead("HKLM\"&strRandomizeRegPath&"\SensorRandomizeFlag") intRandomizeScalingPercentage = objShell.RegRead("HKLM\"&strRandomizeRegPath&"\SensorRandomizeScalingPercentage") On Error Goto 0 If intRandomizeFlag > 0 Then If intRandomizeScalingPercentage > 0 Then intSleepTime = intRandomizeScalingPercentage * .01 * intSleepTime SensorRandomizeEcho "Randomize scaling percentage of " _ & intRandomizeScalingPercentage & " applied, new sleep time is " & intSleepTime End If intSensorRandomizeWaitTime = CLng(intSleepTime) * 1000 ' convert to milliseconds ' wait random interval between 0 and the max Randomize(SensorRandomizeTaniumRandomSeed) ' assign random value to wait time max value intSensorRandomizeWaitTime = Int( ( intSensorRandomizeWaitTime + 1 ) * Rnd ) SensorRandomizeEcho "Sleeping for " & intSensorRandomizeWaitTime & " milliseconds" WScript.Sleep(intSensorRandomizeWaitTime) SensorRandomizeEcho "Done sleeping, continuing ..." Else SensorRandomizeEcho "SensorRandomize Not Enabled - No Op" End If End Function 'SensorRandomizeRandomSleep
Function SensorRandomizeTaniumRandomSeed ' for randomizing sensor code, the default seed is not random enough Dim timerNum timerNum = Timer() If timerNum < 1 Then SensorRandomizeTaniumRandomSeed = (SensorRandomizeGetTaniumComputerID / Timer() * 10 ) Else SensorRandomizeTaniumRandomSeed = SensorRandomizeGetTaniumComputerID / Timer End If End Function 'SensorRandomizeTaniumRandomSeed

Dim objShell Dim keyNativePath, keyWoWPath, strPath, strFoundTaniumRegistryPath
Set objShell = CreateObject("WScript.Shell")
keyNativePath = "Software\Tanium\Tanium Client" keyWoWPath = "Software\Wow6432Node\Tanium\Tanium Client"
' first check the Software key (valid for 32-bit machines, or 64-bit machines in 32-bit mode) On Error Resume Next strPath = objShell.RegRead("HKLM\"&keyNativePath&"\Path") On Error Goto 0 strFoundTaniumRegistryPath = keyNativePath
If strPath = "" Then ' Could not find 32-bit mode path, checking Wow6432Node On Error Resume Next strPath = objShell.RegRead("HKLM\"&keyWoWPath&"\Path") On Error Goto 0 strFoundTaniumRegistryPath = keyWoWPath End If
If Not strPath = "" Then SensorRandomizeGetTaniumRegistryPath = strFoundTaniumRegistryPath Else SensorRandomizeGetTaniumRegistryPath = False WScript.Echo "Error: Cannot locate Tanium Registry Path" End If End Function 'SensorRandomizeGetTaniumRegistryPath
Function SensorRandomizeGetTaniumComputerID '' This function gets the Tanium Computer ID Dim objShell Dim intClientID,strID,strKeyPath,strValueName
strKeyPath = SensorRandomizeGetTaniumRegistryPath strValueName = "ComputerID" Set objShell = CreateObject("WScript.Shell") On Error Resume Next intClientID = objShell.RegRead("HKLM\"&strKeyPath&"\"&strValueName) If Err.Number <> 0 Then SensorRandomizeGetTaniumComputerID = 0 Else SensorRandomizeGetTaniumComputerID = SensorRandomizeReinterpretSignedAsUnsigned(intClientID) End If On Error Goto 0 End Function 'SensorRandomizeGetTaniumComputerID

sensor.name: Wireless Network SSID Strength
sensor.description: Returns the SSID name and signal strength of a connected wireless network where signal strength is 0-5. Example: linksys|4

query.script:
'======================================== ' Wireless Network SSID Strength '========================================
' This sensor uses netsh output to display details about wireless LAN
Option Explicit
Dim strSep
strSep = "|"
' This is a multi-column sensor whose output looks like ' SSID|MAC|State|Network Type|Radio|Authentication|Receive|Transmit|Signal
GetWirelessNetworkDetails strSep
Function GetWirelessNetworkDetails(strSep)
Dim objShell,objScriptExec Dim strCommand, arrNetshResults, strNetshResults Dim strNetshLine, strState, strSSID, strSignal, intSignal Dim bPrintLine, bNewInterface
strCommand = "netsh wlan show interfaces"
Set objShell = CreateObject("WScript.Shell") Set objScriptExec = objShell.Exec (strCommand)
strNetshResults = LCase(objScriptExec.StdOut.ReadAll) arrNetshResults = Split(LCase(strNetshResults),vbCrLf)
For Each strNetshLine In arrNetshResults If InStr(strNetshLine,"name") > 0 Then bNewInterface = True ' if there's a new Name, it's time to note a new group End If If InStr(strNetshLine, "state") > 0 Then strState = Trim(Split(strNetshLine,":")(1)) End If If InStr(strNetshLine, "ssid") > 0 And Not InStr(strNetshLine, "bssid") > 0 Then strSSID = Trim(Split(strNetshLine,":")(1)) End If If InStr(strNetshLine,"signal") > 0 Then strSignal = Replace(Trim(Split(strNetshLine,":")(1)),"%","") ' remove the percentage intSignal = CInt(CInt(strSignal) / 20) bPrintLine = True ' If we've found an Signal Value, it's time to print the line. End If If bNewInterface And bPrintLine Then ' if it's a new group, and at last line in the new group, print WScript.Echo strSSID & strSep & intSignal bPrintLine = False End If Next
'Cleanup Set objScriptExec = Nothing Set objShell = Nothing End Function 'GetWirelessNetworkDetails

sensor.name: Username
sensor.description: Returns the currently logged in user, and No User if nobody is logged in. Example: Domain\JDoe

query.script:
'======================================== ' Username '========================================
Option Explicit
Dim strComputer, objWMIService, colComputer, objComputer
strComputer = "." Set objWMIService = GetObject("winmgmts:" & "{impersonationLevel=impersonate}!\\" & strComputer & "\root\cimv2") Set colComputer = objWMIService.ExecQuery ("Select UserName from Win32_ComputerSystem")
For Each objComputer in colComputer if objComputer.UserName <> "" Then Wscript.Echo StripDuplicateDomains(objComputer.UserName) Else Wscript.Echo "No User" End If Next
WScript.Quit ' End
Function StripDuplicateDomains(strInput) ' Removes duplicate domain prefixes Dim arrWords,strResult strResult = strInput
If InStr(strInput,"\") Then arrWords = Split(strInput,"\") If UBound(arrWords) >= 2 And LCase(arrWords(0)) = LCase(arrWords(1)) Then ' Remove duplicate strResult = arrWords(0) & "\" & arrWords(2) End If End if
StripDuplicateDomains = strResult End Function

sensor.name: Wireless Network Connected SSID
sensor.description: Returns the SSID (name) of a wireless network a machine is connected to. Example: linksys

query.script:
'======================================== ' Wireless Network Connected SSID '========================================
' This sensor uses netsh output to display details about wireless LAN
Option Explicit
Dim strSep
strSep = "|"
GetConnectedWirelessNetwork strSep
Function GetConnectedWirelessNetwork(strSep)
Dim objShell,objScriptExec Dim strCommand, arrNetshResults, strNetshResults Dim strNetshLine, strState, strSSID Dim bPrintLine, bNewInterface, bConnected
strCommand = "netsh wlan show interfaces"
Set objShell = CreateObject("WScript.Shell") Set objScriptExec = objShell.Exec (strCommand)
strNetshResults = LCase(objScriptExec.StdOut.ReadAll) arrNetshResults = Split(LCase(strNetshResults),vbCrLf)
bConnected = False 'assume no connections
For Each strNetshLine In arrNetshResults If InStr(strNetshLine,"name") > 0 Then bNewInterface = True ' if there's a new Name, it's time to note a new group End If If InStr(strNetshLine, "state") > 0 Then strState = Trim(Split(strNetshLine,":")(1)) End If If InStr(strNetshLine, "ssid") > 0 And Not InStr(strNetshLine, "bssid") > 0 Then strSSID = Trim(Split(strNetshLine,":")(1)) End If If InStr(strNetshLine,"signal") > 0 Then bPrintLine = True ' If we've found an Signal Value, it's time to print the line. End If If bNewInterface And bPrintLine Then ' if it's a new group, and at last line in the new group, print If InStr(LCase(strState),"connected") > 0 Then WScript.Echo strSSID bConnected = True End If bNewInterface = False bPrintLine = False End If Next
If Not bConnected Then WScript.Echo ":No Connection:" End If
'Cleanup Set objScriptExec = Nothing Set objShell = Nothing End Function 'GetConnectedWirelessNetwork

#!/bin/bash
/System/Library/PrivateFrameworks/Apple80211.framework/Versions/Current/Resources/airport -I | awk '/ SSID/ {print substr($0, index($0, $2))}'

sensor.name: Wireless Networks Visible
sensor.description: Returns details of all wireless networks a machine can see, whether they are connected or not. Details include SSID, Network Type, Authentication Method, and Encryption Level. Example: hotspotwifi | Infrastructure | WPA2-Personal

query.script:
'======================================== ' Wireless Networks Visible '========================================
' This sensor uses netsh output to display all visible ' SSIDs
Option Explicit
Dim strSep, strSSIDWhiteList,arrSSIDWhiteList
strSep = "|" ' This is a multi-column sensor whose output looks like ' SSID|Network Type|Authentication|Encryption
strSSIDWhiteList = "" 'strSSIDWhiteList = "linksys" 'strSSIDWhiteList = "ATTNET,ApprovedSSID1,ApprovedSSID2,etc ..."
GetSSIDs strSep, strSSIDWhiteList
Function GetSSIDs(strSep, strSSIDWhiteList)
Dim objShell,objScriptExec Dim strCommand, arrNetshResults, strNetshResults Dim strNetshLine, strSSID, strNetworkType,strAuthentication, strEncryption Dim bPrintLine, bNewSSID
strCommand = "netsh wlan show networks"
Set objShell = CreateObject("WScript.Shell") Set objScriptExec = objShell.Exec (strCommand)
strNetshResults = LCase(objScriptExec.StdOut.ReadAll) arrNetshResults = Split(LCase(strNetshResults),vbCrLf)
For Each strNetshLine In arrNetshResults If InStr(strNetshLine,"ssid") > 0 Then bNewSSID = True ' if there's SSD, it's time to note a new group strSSID = Trim(Split(strNetshLine,":")(1)) End If If InStr(strNetshLine, "network type") > 0 Then strNetworkType = Trim(Split(strNetshLine,":")(1)) End If If InStr(strNetshLine,"authentication") > 0 Then strAuthentication = Trim(Split(strNetshLine,":")(1)) End If If InStr(strNetshLine,"encryption") > 0 Then strEncryption = Trim(Split(strNetshLine,":")(1)) bPrintLine = True ' If we've found an Encryption Value, it's time to print the line. End If If bNewSSID And bPrintLine And Not InStr(LCase(strSSIDWhiteList), LCase(strSSID)) > 0 Then ' if it's a new group, and at last line in the new group, print WScript.Echo strSSID & strSep & strNetworkType & strSep & strAuthentication & strSep & strEncryption bNewSSID = False bPrintLine = False End If Next
'Cleanup Set objScriptExec = Nothing Set objShell = Nothing End Function 'GetSSIDs

sensor.name: Wireless Network Details
sensor.description: Details of currently active wireless network connection by client machine. Details include SSID, MAC address, connection state, network type, radio type, authentication, receive rate, transmit rate, and signal strength. Example: hotspotwifi | xx-xx-xx-xx-xx-xx | connected | Infrastructure | 802.11g | WPA2-Personal | 54 | 54 | 99%

query.script:
'======================================== ' Wireless Network Details '========================================
' This sensor uses netsh output to display details about wireless LAN
Option Explicit
Dim strSep
strSep = "|"
' This is a multi-column sensor whose output looks like ' SSID|MAC|State|Network Type|Radio|Authentication|Receive|Transmit|Signal 0-5
GetWirelessNetworkDetails strSep
Function GetWirelessNetworkDetails(strSep)
Dim objShell,objScriptExec Dim strCommand, arrNetshResults, strNetshResults Dim strNetshLine, strName, strMAC, strState, strSSID Dim strNetworkType, strRadioType, strAuthentication Dim strReceiveRate, strTransmitRate, strSignal, intSignal Dim bPrintLine, bNewInterface
strCommand = "netsh wlan show interfaces"
Set objShell = CreateObject("WScript.Shell") Set objScriptExec = objShell.Exec (strCommand)
strNetshResults = LCase(objScriptExec.StdOut.ReadAll) arrNetshResults = Split(LCase(strNetshResults),vbCrLf)
For Each strNetshLine In arrNetshResults If InStr(strNetshLine,"name") > 0 Then bNewInterface = True ' if there's a new Name, it's time to note a new group strName = Trim(Split(strNetshLine,":")(1)) End If If InStr(strNetshLine, "physical address") > 0 Then strMAC = Trim(Split(strNetshLine,": ")(1)) End If If InStr(strNetshLine, "state") > 0 Then strState = Trim(Split(strNetshLine,":")(1)) End If If InStr(strNetshLine, "ssid") > 0 And Not InStr(strNetshLine, "bssid") > 0 Then strSSID = Trim(Split(strNetshLine,":")(1)) End If If InStr(strNetshLine, "network type") > 0 Then strNetworkType = Trim(Split(strNetshLine,":")(1)) End If If InStr(strNetshLine, "radio type") > 0 Then strRadioType = Trim(Split(strNetshLine,":")(1)) End If If InStr(strNetshLine,"authentication") > 0 Then strAuthentication = Trim(Split(strNetshLine,":")(1)) End If If InStr(strNetshLine,"receive rate") > 0 Then strReceiveRate = Trim(Split(strNetshLine,":")(1)) & " Mbps" End If If InStr(strNetshLine,"transmit rate") > 0 Then strTransmitRate = Trim(Split(strNetshLine,":")(1)) & " Mbps" End If If InStr(strNetshLine,"signal") > 0 Then strSignal = Replace(Trim(Split(strNetshLine,":")(1)),"%","") ' remove % intSignal = CInt(CInt(strSignal) / 20) bPrintLine = True ' If we've found an Signal Value, it's time to print the line. End If If bNewInterface And bPrintLine Then ' if it's a new group, and at last line in the new group, print WScript.Echo strSSID & strSep & strMAC & strSep & strState & strSep & strNetworkType _ & strSep & strRadioType & strSep & strAuthentication & strSep & strReceiveRate & strSep _ & strTransmitRate & strSep & intSignal bNewInterface = False bPrintLine = False End If Next
'Cleanup Set objScriptExec = Nothing Set objShell = Nothing End Function 'GetWirelessNetworkDetails

sensor.name: Wireless Network Used by Tanium
sensor.description: Returns the SSID name, the IP Address, and the MAC address of connected wireless networks only if the Tanium Client is using those networks to communicate. Example: linksys|192.168.10.5|00D55FED214C1A2C

query.script:
'======================================== ' Wireless Network Used by Tanium '========================================
' This sensor uses netsh output to display details about wireless LAN ' if the IP is used by the Tanium Client
Option Explicit
Dim strSep, strTaniumIPAddress, strTaniumMAC
strTaniumIPAddress = GetTaniumIPAddress If strTaniumIPAddress = False Then WScript.Echo "Can't retrieve Tanium Client's IP address" End If
strTaniumMAC = GetMACByIP(strTaniumIPAddress)
strSep = "|"
' This is a multi-column sensor whose output looks like ' SSID|IPAddress|MAC
GetTaniumWirelessNetworkDetailsFromMAC strSep, strTaniumMAC, strTaniumIPAddress
Function GetTaniumWirelessNetworkDetailsFromMAC(strSep, strMACArg, strIPAddressArg)
Dim objShell,objScriptExec Dim strCommand, arrNetshResults, strNetshResults Dim strNetshLine, strState, strSSID, strSignal, intSignal Dim bPrintLine, bNewInterface, strMAC Dim bFoundMAC
strCommand = "netsh wlan show interfaces"
Set objShell = CreateObject("WScript.Shell") Set objScriptExec = objShell.Exec (strCommand)
strNetshResults = LCase(objScriptExec.StdOut.ReadAll) arrNetshResults = Split(LCase(strNetshResults),vbCrLf)
bFoundMAC = False
For Each strNetshLine In arrNetshResults If InStr(strNetshLine,"name") > 0 Then bNewInterface = True ' if there's a new Name, it's time to note a new group End If If InStr(strNetshLine, "state") > 0 Then strState = Trim(Split(strNetshLine,":")(1)) End If If InStr(strNetshLine, "ssid") > 0 And Not InStr(strNetshLine, "bssid") > 0 Then strSSID = Trim(Split(strNetshLine,":")(1)) End If If InStr(strNetshLine, "physical address") > 0 Then strMAC = Trim(Split(strNetshLine,": ")(1)) If LCase(strMAC) = LCase(strMACArg) Then bFoundMAC = True End If End If If InStr(strNetshLine,"signal") > 0 Then strSignal = Replace(Trim(Split(strNetshLine,":")(1)),"%","") ' remove the percentage intSignal = CInt(CInt(strSignal) / 20) bPrintLine = True ' If we've found an Signal Value, it's time to print the line. End If If bNewInterface And bPrintLine And bFoundMAC Then ' if it's a new group, and at last line in the new group, and we found MAC, print strIPAddressArg = left(strIPAddressArg,len(strIPAddressArg)-4) WScript.Echo strSSID & strSep & strIPAddressArg & strSep & intSignal bPrintLine = False End If Next
If Not bFoundMAC Then WScript.Echo ":Wired:" End If
'Cleanup Set objScriptExec = Nothing Set objShell = Nothing End Function 'GetWirelessNetworkDetailsFromMAC
Function GetTaniumIPAddress ' Modified from the ua-scan code to remove the subnet and last octet calculations ' which are irrelevant for these purposes. ' Returns the IP address that the client uses for Tanium activity ' (talking to server and other clients)
Dim strComputer, objReg, strCommand, objShell, objScriptExec Dim strResults, arrPathPingLines, strPathPingLine, arrPathPingWords Dim strIPAddress, strTaniumPath, strClientAddress Dim strServerName
strComputer = "." Set objReg = GetObject("winmgmts:{impersonationLevel=impersonate}!\\" & strComputer & "\root\default:StdRegProv") Const HKLM = &h80000002
''###########Get Tanium Key on 64/32bit computers##########
strTaniumPath = GetTaniumRegistryPath()
' if we can pull this from the registry (newer client version), just use that objReg.GetStringValue HKLM, strTaniumPath & "\Status", "ClientAddress", strClientAddress If strClientAddress <> "" Then strClientAddress = Left(strClientAddress,InStr(strClientAddress,"_")-1) strClientAddress = Right(strClientAddress,len(strClientAddress)-InStrRev(strClientAddress,":")) ' WScript.Echo "Found " & strClientAddress & " in Registry" GetTaniumIPAddress = strClientAddress 'Cleanup Set objReg = Nothing Exit Function End If
'Otherwise use PathPing to determine client IP used by Tanium
''# Read the ServerName value
objReg.GetStringValue HKLM, strTaniumPath, "ServerName", strServerName
strCommand = "pathping -4 -q 1 -w 1 -n " & strServerName Set objShell = CreateObject("WScript.Shell") Set objScriptExec = objShell.Exec (strCommand) strResults = objScriptExec.StdOut.ReadAll
arrPathPingLines = Split(strResults, vbCrLf) For Each strPathPingLine In arrPathPingLines arrPathPingWords = Split(CleanWhitespace(Trim(strPathPingLine)), " ") If UBound(arrPathPingWords) > 0 Then If arrPathPingWords(0) = "0" Then strIPAddress = arrPathPingWords(1) Exit For End If End If Next
Set objShell = Nothing Set objScriptExec = Nothing Set objReg = Nothing
If Not IsNull(strIPAddress) Then GetTaniumIPAddress = strIPAddress Else GetTaniumIPAddress = False End If End Function 'GetTaniumIPAddress
Function RegKeyExists(objRegistry, sHive, sRegKey) Dim aValueNames, aValueTypes If objRegistry.EnumValues(sHive, sRegKey, aValueNames, aValueTypes) = 0 Then RegKeyExists = True Else RegKeyExists = False End If End Function 'RegKeyExists
Function GetTaniumRegistryPath 'GetTaniumRegistryPath works in x64 or x32 'looks for a valid Path value
Dim objShell Dim keyNativePath, keyWoWPath, strPath, strFoundTaniumRegistryPath
Set objShell = CreateObject("WScript.Shell")
keyNativePath = "Software\Tanium\Tanium Client" keyWoWPath = "Software\Wow6432Node\Tanium\Tanium Client"
' first check the Software key (valid for 32-bit machines, or 64-bit machines in 32-bit mode) On Error Resume Next strPath = objShell.RegRead("HKLM\"&keyNativePath&"\Path") On Error Goto 0 strFoundTaniumRegistryPath = keyNativePath
If strPath = "" Then ' Could not find 32-bit mode path, checking Wow6432Node On Error Resume Next strPath = objShell.RegRead("HKLM\"&keyWoWPath&"\Path") On Error Goto 0 strFoundTaniumRegistryPath = keyWoWPath End If
If Not strPath = "" Then GetTaniumRegistryPath = strFoundTaniumRegistryPath Else GetTaniumRegistryPath = False WScript.Echo "Error: Cannot locate Tanium Registry Path" End If End Function 'GetTaniumRegistryPath
Function GetMACByIP(strIP)
Dim strFoundIP, strFoundMAC, bFound Dim objWMIService, colItems, objItem
Set objWMIService = GetObject("winmgmts:\\.\root\cimv2") Set colItems = objWMIService.ExecQuery("Select * from Win32_NetworkAdapterConfiguration",,48)
For Each objItem in colItems If Not IsNull(objItem.IPAddress) Then For Each strFoundIP In objItem.IPAddress If strIP = strFoundIP Then bFound = True strFoundMAC = objItem.MACAddress End If Next End If Next
If bFound Then GetMACByIP = strFoundMAC Else GetMACByIP = False End If
'Cleanup Set colItems = Nothing Set objWMIService = Nothing
End Function 'GetMACByIP

#!/bin/bash # cah # Created 20140620 # Modified # looking for wireless network SSIDs actively used by Tanium client.i've # SSID MAC State NetworkType Radio Authentication Receive Transmit Signal(0-5) , delimiter is | # Quality conversions based off of: http://stackoverflow.com/questions/15797920/how-to-convert-wifi-signal-strength-from-quality-percent-to-rssi-dbm
AIRPATH="/System/Library/PrivateFrameworks/Apple80211.framework/Versions/Current/Resources" RADIO="unknown"
DEVID=$(networksetup -listallhardwareports | grep -A1 Wi-Fi | awk -F "Device: " '{print $2}' | grep -v "^$") #echo $DEVID DEVMAC=$(networksetup -getmacaddress $DEVID | awk -F": " '{print $2}' | awk -F"(" '{print $1}')
TANIUMIP=$( netstat -atn | grep 17472 | awk '{print $4}'|grep 17472|awk -F\. '{print $1"."$2"."$3"."$4}' | sort -u )
WIRELESSIP=$( networksetup -getinfo Wi-Fi | grep "IP address" | grep -v "IPv6" | awk '{print $3}' )
if [ "$TANIUMIP"=="$WIRELESSIP" ] ; then
#Get SSID SSID=$(networksetup -getairportnetwork $DEVID | awk -F": " '{print $2}')
if [ ! "$SSID" ] ; then SSID="Not Available" SIGNAL="Not Available" fi
if [ "$SSID" != "Not Available" ] ; then PWR=$( $AIRPATH/airport -I | awk -F"agrCtlRSSI:" '{print $2}' | grep -v "^$" ) # This is to convert from power to MS dummy gauge if (( $PWR <= "-100" )) ; then SIGNAL="0" elif ((( $PWR > "-100" ) && ( $PWR < "-93" ))) ; then SIGNAL="1" elif ((( $PWR >= "-93" ) && ( $PWR < "-87" ))) ; then SIGNAL="2" elif ((( $PWR >= "-87" ) && ( $PWR < "-75" ))) ; then SIGNAL="3" elif ((( $PWR >= "-75" ) && ( $PWR < "-50" ))) ; then SIGNAL="4" else SIGNAL="5" fi echo "$SSID | $TANIUMIP | $SIGNAL ($PWR dB) " else STATE=$( $AIRPATH/airport -I | grep "state:" | awk '{print $2}' ) if [ ! "$STATE" ] ; then STATE=":Wired:||" echo "$STATE" fi fi
fi
exit

sensor.name: MAC Address
sensor.description: Returns MAC addresses for all IP enabled network connections. Example:00:0C:29:68:6A:D8

query.script: select MACAddress from win32_networkadapterconfiguration where IPEnabled='True'
networksetup -listallhardwareports | egrep -A 2 "(: Ethernet|: AirPort|: Wi-Fi)" | grep "Ethernet Address" | cut -f 3- -d ' '

sensor.name: DHCP Enabled?
sensor.description: Whether or not a machine has an network adapter set to DHCP. Note, a machine may have multiple active adapters and may return multiple lines. If a machine has multiple adapters on DCHP, TRUE is returned only once. Example: TRUE, FALSE

query.script: select DHCPEnabled from win32_networkadapterconfiguration where IPEnabled='True'

sensor.name: Firewall Status
sensor.description: Returns the current status of the Windows firewalls. Example: DomainProfile enabled

query.script:
'======================================== ' Firewall Status '========================================
On Error Resume Next
const HKLM = &H80000002 const strKeyPath = "SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Services\SharedAccess\Parameters\FirewallPolicy\" const strValueName = "EnableFirewall" strComputer = "."
Set oReg=GetObject( _ "winmgmts:{impersonationLevel=impersonate}!\\" &_ strComputer & "\root\default:StdRegProv")
WScript.Echo GetFirewallStatus(strKeyPath, "DomainProfile", strValueName) WScript.Echo GetFirewallStatus(strKeyPath, "PublicProfile", strValueName) WScript.Echo GetFirewallStatus(strKeyPath, "StandardProfile", strValueName)
Function GetFirewallStatus(path, policy, valName) oReg.GetDWORDValue HKLM,path & policy, valName, dwValue If Not IsNull(dwValue) Then If dwValue = 0 Then GetFirewallStatus = policy & " disabled" ElseIf dwValue = 1 Then GetFirewallStatus = policy & " enabled" End If Else 'Policy not found, ignore End If End Function
#!/bin/bash system_profiler SPFirewallDataType | grep -i "Mode" | grep -v "Stealth Mode" | awk -F': ' ' { print $2 } '

sensor.name: Open Share Details
sensor.description: Returns a set of columns with details about open shares on a machine. Example: name | path | status | type | permissions

query.script:
'======================================== ' Open Share Details '========================================
Set dictBlacklist = CreateObject("Scripting.Dictionary")
' Add one line for each admin user that you do not want listed in the sensor output. ' dictBlacklist.Add LCase("NomadSHR"), True
Set objWMIService = GetObject("winmgmts:\\.\root\cimv2") Set colItems = objWMIService.ExecQuery("Select * from Win32_Share where caption != 'Default Share' AND caption != 'Remote Admin' AND caption != 'Remote IPC'",,48)
strSep = "|"
